job_lists.title: Senior Web Applications Developer
job_lists.company: 大陸工程股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
Continental Engineering (大陸工程) is currently seeking a detail oriented Senior Web Applications Developer with excellent programing and problem solving skills to join our Information Technology team. The successful candidate will play a key role to ensure the stability, integrity, and efficient operation of the in-house information systems that support core organizational functions. He / She will also apply proven communication, analytical, and problem-solving skills to help identify, communicate, and resolve issues in order to maximize the benefit of IT system investments. This position is located in Taipei, Taiwan
Responsibilities: 
1.BS/MS in computer science or software engineering or information management system and 7+ years equivalent work experience.
2.Play as PG and SA in application projects.
3.Develop, manage and enhance application systems.
4.Analyze, design, and hands on applications in a web delivery environment, including user requirements collecting and analysis, framework design, and systematic approaches to application interaction and integrtion.
5.Have ability to manage multiple projects and meet deadlines.
6.Able to prioritize and execute tasks in a high-pressure environment.
7.Strong organizational, problem-solving, presentation, and analytical skills.
8.Very customer service focused and value-driven.
9.Willing to learn, positive and proactive attitude, and team player
10.Passionate to learn new technologies quickly through self-study and internal knowledge sharing
11.Business travel is occasionally needed
job_lists.other_condition:
Technical Requirements:
1.5+ years of web development in C#, ASP.NET, MVC and TFS.
2.3+ years of experience in system analysis and design capability.
3.Strong programming knowledge of AJAX, Java Script, jQuery, Web Service, MVC, HTML5 and CSS
4.Strong understanding of responsive website design.
5.Good knowledge in MS SQL database design and development.
6.Experience with Scrum or PM/SA is a plus.
7.Workflow/BPM design and SharePoint custom application development experience is a plus
8.Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English is a plus

job_lists.title: ERP程式設計師
job_lists.company: 明昌工業股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
1.熟悉鼎新TIPTOP系統流程與架構。
2.熟悉鼎新TIPTOP畫面與報表程式(CR)開發與設計。
3.熟悉Linux及Oracle相關系統維護與管理。
4.主導TIPTOP ERP系統上線.
5.鼎新TIPTOP ERP系統程式客制撰寫'報表開發'流程規劃管理及維護(資料導入'介面      調整'設定'生產/測試設備連線整合等應用開發及優化)
6.協助公司電腦系統主機'內外網路環境'寄送內外郵件系統'防火牆及資安防護等之管理及維護.
7.協助解決使用者在網路與系統設備的問題及電腦軟硬體的故障排除.
8.執行並督促部門其他MIS資訊相關工作(如服務器架設'備份與維護'機房'電話總機系統設備維護管理等).
9.落實KPI及部門管理'工作安排'追蹤以及技術指導'教育訓練等.
10.對系統開發有熱忱,抗壓性高。
11.具良好溝通協調能力。
12.需具備英文溝通能力。
job_lists.other_condition: 對系統開發有熱忱，具良好溝通協調能力，抗壓性高。

job_lists.title: Business Analyst
job_lists.company: Asia Fusion Technology_飛迅設計有限公司
job_lists.content:
Purpose of the Position:  Provides assistance and support to the Project Manager in terms of analysis, design and implementation of data processing systems. He/she is responsible for documentation, presentation, requirements and specifications of the project and possibly for other departments.

Responsibilities:
1. Business Analysis
 Correctly captures the business needs and expectations from all stakeholders.
 Documents Functional/Business/Compliance Requirements

2. Management Information System
 Develops and maintains systems documentation and user manuals.
 Orients users on the proper usage of application systems.

3. Quality Assurance
 Develops test data and performs system testing activities in coordination with prospective users.

4. Administrative Efficiency
 Provides status reports on work activities.

5. Special Projects
 Assists in Project Management.
 Performs other functions that may be required from time to time.
job_lists.other_condition:
-Must have 3-4 years’ experience working in an IT related start up with all project teams.
-Gaming background is preferred.
-Business Minded, having worked with or in business teams previously
-Ability to manage customer relationships in a professional manner
-Exemplary documentation skills in requirements, sales, training.
-Fluency in English & Chinese is a must
-Experience working with APIs and technical documentation
-Understanding of SQL a plus
-Experience working in an international company and co-work with colleagues from foreign countries.
-Good in writing, presentation, communication

3. Higher diploma or above major in IT management / IT engineering is a plus.
4. Proactive on learning new knowledge, asking for problem solving method.

job_lists.title: Android App 軟體工程師
job_lists.company: 叫車通資訊股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
在這裡，我們玩的是創意，產出的是改善大眾生活的服務，贏得的是使用者的口碑！

在這裡，你要做的是絞盡腦汁，與同事相互驗證理清程式邏輯，設法周全整套系統的眉眉角角

Yes! 我們需要的是具備獨立開發能力，但渴望隨時有背援和夥伴支持的Programmer

遇到困難，沒有人會直接提供你Solution，因為我們知道你一定會先Google，有了自己的想法

你需要的是經驗，也就是實戰成果的交流，更多的分析角度和觀點，以及當你提出解決方案時，適當的提醒與再確認

我們主要玩的是自有新創產品 - 整合與創新

如果你也喜歡以上的工作氛圍，我們會以開放的心態，歡迎你的加入，並把你當做主力！

念書時間不算，實際寫一套軟體（無論大小，種類，寫論文或工作需要）的時間才算

能搞出一個可以上架，有人下載還真的有人用的APP（整合多種服務者佳）

至少要了解TCP / UDP運作原理，清楚在網路環境下該注意哪些狀況，有哪些「洞」要閃

看到問題就是要找到答案才爽，如果自己想出Google上沒有人想到的答案更是爽翻天！

2.願意與他人分享看法，並參考不同角度

信奉力行：「解決問題快又有效的方法之一，就是問走過這條路的人」，沒有幼稚的面子障礙

3.覺得用自己的技術，改變別人的生活方式，是一件「好」事

源自有成就感、有愛心、人生在世有價值，對得起父母老師自己苦讀等...以上任一「好」理由

4.有基本溝通和禮貌倫理

大概知道哪些場合可以和名義上的主管對著幹，哪些場合必須忍一下再找機會溝通解決

三、加分項

1.搞過Socket Server 架構觀念

2.具備JSP / Ajax / Jquery 開發經驗尤佳

具有以下狀況者，請再三思考：

1.愛抱怨，常覺得每件事別人有錯

2.證明自己對比什麼都重要

3.常在想公司應該怎樣怎樣怎樣怎樣怎樣.......................，想到忘記自己目前該做啥

4.我的OO或什麼什麼的很重要，（所以我應該不用配合某件事吧... )

5.擔心學校教的不夠用，需專人帶領手把手教導，不然無法發揮潛力或實力

因為我們團隊寫Code大家腦袋都很忙，只想趕快把事情做好，可能沒辦法也沒能力關心有以上
狀況的同事，為了避免照顧不周產生誤會，因此目前忍痛只做朋友。

我們公司絕對不是最好的軟體公司，請不要用Facebook、Google等公司的等級來評比，我們承

認沒得比，但如果您符合以上的條件，個性也與本公司團隊投緣，有自己職業生涯的目標要求，

而又不嫌棄的話，我們非常樂意提供薪資的討論空間，期待與你一起談談！

先告知：我們對學位或學校沒有特別偏好，但是數學（邏輯和解題）和語文（中文和英文，上Google、查論壇、和別人溝通）的基本能力看得非常非常重，因為我們真的也沒能力教育訓練這兩項能力，請包涵！

源自有成就感、有愛心、人生在世有價值，對得起父母老師自己苦讀等...以上任一「好」理由

4.有基本溝通和禮貌倫理

大概知道哪些場合可以和名義上的主管對著幹，哪些場合必須忍一下再找機會溝通解決

三、加分項

1.搞過Socket Server 架構觀念

2.具備JSP / Ajax / Jquery 開發經驗尤佳

具有以下狀況者，請再三思考：

1.愛抱怨，常覺得每件事別人有錯

2.證明自己對比什麼都重要

3.常在想公司應該怎樣怎樣怎樣怎樣怎樣.......................，想到忘記自己目前該做啥

4.我的OO或什麼什麼的很重要，（所以我應該不用配合某件事吧... )

5.擔心學校教的不夠用，需專人帶領手把手教導，不然無法發揮潛力或實力

因為我們團隊寫Code大家腦袋都很忙，只想趕快把事情做好，可能沒辦法也沒能力關心有以上

狀況的同事，為了避免照顧不周產生誤會，因此目前忍痛只做朋友。

我們公司絕對不是最好的軟體公司，請不要用Facebook、Google等公司的等級來評比，我們承

認沒得比，但如果您符合以上的條件，個性也與本公司團隊投緣，有自己職業生涯的目標要求，

而又不嫌棄的話，我們非常樂意提供薪資的討論空間，期待與你一起談談！

先告知：我們對學位或學校沒有特別偏好，但是數學（邏輯和解題）和語文（中文和英文，上Google、查論壇、和別人溝通）的基本能力看得非常非常重，因為我們真的也沒能力教育訓練這兩項能力，請包涵！

當然，如果彼此可以長久共事，員工認股或配股等該拿出來深化結緣的作業是一定有的，就請你
一起來幫助團隊成長！

job_lists.title: Internet 工程師
job_lists.company: 叫車通資訊股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
在您瞭解本公司簡介與職缺之前，建議您先閱讀以下文章 
http://www.businessweekly.com.tw/KBlogArticle.aspx?id=4909 
如果您也贊同Facebook營運長：雪柔．桑德伯格（Sheryl Sandberg）的看法 
那就表示您走對地方了! 

在這裡，我們玩的是創意，產出的是改善大眾生活的服務，贏得的是使用者的口碑！ 

在這裡，你要做的是絞盡腦汁，與同事相互驗證理清程式邏輯，設法周全整套系統的眉眉角角 

Yes! 我們需要的是具備獨立開發能力，但渴望隨時有背援和夥伴支持的Programmer

遇到困難，沒有人會直接提供你Solution，因為我們知道你一定會先Google，有了自己的想法 

你需要的是經驗，也就是實戰成果的交流，更多的分析角度和觀點，以及當你提出解決方案時，適當的提醒與再確認 

我們主要玩的是自有新創產品 - 整合與創新 

如果你也喜歡以上的工作氛圍，我們會以開放的心態，歡迎你的加入，並把你當做主力！ 

以下是一些徵才條件，而對上面文字充足理解的人，應該心裡已經有底！ 

一、能力或資歷： 

1.網站開發經驗網站3年以上： 

念書時間不算，實際寫網站（無論大小，種類，寫論文或工作需要）的時間才算 

2.熟JSPorPHP / MySQL / Linux： 

一定要會用，因為我們公司用這一套。Linux要能架設基本網路服務和設定參數，MySQL要會寫Script，會Connection Pool，更重要的是資料庫規劃設計（正規化）能力 

3.熟CSS / DIV / Jquery / Jscript / AJAX： 

不需要拿來設計，但要能調能改，而且知道限制和副作用在哪 

4.團隊合作經驗 

和視覺或介面設計師合作，為了需求調整改來改去的經驗（你懂我在說什麼的） 

二、人格特質： 

1.很喜歡自己解決問題的快感 

看到問題就是要找到答案才爽，如果自己想出Google上沒有人想到的答案更是爽翻天！ 

2.願意與他人分享看法，並參考不同角度 

信奉力行：「解決問題快又有效的方法之一，就是問走過這條路的人」，沒有幼稚的面子障礙 

3.喜歡釐清、分門別類、讓事物井然有序，合作無間 

4.有基本溝通和禮貌倫理 

大概知道哪些場合可以和名義上的主管對著幹，哪些場合必須忍一下再找機會溝通解決

5.有當仁不讓的自覺 

做事態度：與其告訴別人調這調那，不如自己直接弄一弄還比較快，反正最後還是得做

三、加分項 

1.具備系統分析、管理經驗、喜歡訂進度、盯進度、找人開會釐清事情和分配責任 

2.玩過AWS等Cloud Server服務 

3.自己喜歡找一些有的沒的軟體工具玩一下，改個設定之類的 

具有以下狀況者，請再三思考： 

1.愛抱怨，常覺得每件事別人有錯 

2.證明自己對比什麼都重要 

3.常在想公司應該怎樣怎樣怎樣怎樣怎樣.......................，想到忘記自己目前該做啥 

4.我的OO或什麼什麼的很重要，（所以我應該不用配合某件事吧... ) 

5.擔心學校教的不夠用，需專人帶領手把手教導，不然無法發揮潛力或實力 

因為我們團隊寫Code大家腦袋都很忙，只想趕快把事情做好，可能沒辦法也沒能力關心有以上 
狀況的同事，為了避免照顧不周產生誤會，因此目前忍痛只做朋友。 

我們公司絕對不是最好的軟體公司，請不要用Facebook、Google等公司的等級來評比，我們承認沒得比，但如果您符合以上的條件，個性也與本公司團隊投緣，有自己職業生涯的目標要求，而又不嫌棄的話，我們非常樂意提供薪資的討論空間，期待與你一起談談！ 

先告知：我們對學位或學校沒有特別偏好，但是數學（邏輯和解題）和語文（中文和英文，上Google、查論壇、和別人溝通）的基本能力看得非常非常重，因為我們真的也沒能力教育訓練這兩項能力，請包涵！ 

當然，如果彼此可以長久共事，員工認股或配股等該拿出來深化結緣的作業是一定有的，就請你一起來幫助團隊成長！

job_lists.title: Senior Web Applications Developer
job_lists.company: 大陸工程股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
Continental Engineering (大陸工程) is currently seeking a detail oriented Senior Web Applications Developer with excellent programing and problem solving skills to join our Information Technology team. The successful candidate will play a key role to ensure the stability, integrity, and efficient operation of the in-house information systems that support core organizational functions. He / She will also apply proven communication, analytical, and problem-solving skills to help identify, communicate, and resolve issues in order to maximize the benefit of IT system investments. This position is located in Taipei, Taiwan
Responsibilities: 
1.BS/MS in computer science or software engineering or information management system and 7+ years equivalent work experience.
2.Play as PG and SA in application projects.
3.Develop, manage and enhance application systems.
4.Analyze, design, and hands on applications in a web delivery environment, including user requirements collecting and analysis, framework design, and systematic approaches to application interaction and integrtion.
5.Have ability to manage multiple projects and meet deadlines.
6.Able to prioritize and execute tasks in a high-pressure environment.
7.Strong organizational, problem-solving, presentation, and analytical skills.
8.Very customer service focused and value-driven.
9.Willing to learn, positive and proactive attitude, and team player
10.Passionate to learn new technologies quickly through self-study and internal knowledge sharing
11.Business travel is occasionally needed
job_lists.other_condition:
Technical Requirements:
1.5+ years of web development in C#, ASP.NET, MVC and TFS.
2.3+ years of experience in system analysis and design capability.
3.Strong programming knowledge of AJAX, Java Script, jQuery, Web Service, MVC, HTML5 and CSS
4.Strong understanding of responsive website design.
5.Good knowledge in MS SQL database design and development.
6.Experience with Scrum or PM/SA is a plus.
7.Workflow/BPM design and SharePoint custom application development experience is a plus
8.Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English is a plus

job_lists.title: C#軟體工程師(MVC, ASP.NET) (上海）
job_lists.company: 美商Wolf Dataware 五甫科技_高鋒投資股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
大家好，我們是「Wolf Dataware」五甫科技，身為由矽谷出發，成為亞太第一名的醫療應用軟體服務商，我們希望未來加入五甫大家庭的人，有著跟我們有一樣的願景。可以藉由提供精準醫療的數據分析，給醫療院所或研究機構，讓他們服務的病人可以得到最佳的治療方式。

目前Wolf Dataware把美國幫助各大醫療院所導入臨床研究系統的經驗，帶到亞洲來幫助亞洲的醫學中心進行臨床試驗管理，協助醫院有效控制成本，提高臨床研究的成功率。目前產品的主要用戶包含美國新聞與世界報導 (U.S.News & World Report)前50名的醫院，如：排名第二名的克裏夫蘭醫療中心(The Cleveland Clinic)，及第三名的麻省總醫院(Massachusetts General Hospital)等等。

Wolf Dataware也提供医院及研究中心客制化的解决方案，包含協助細胞治療中心搜集與分析治療所產生的數據、協助基因研究中心整合樣品與檢驗數據，管理實驗室實驗數據。同時也可以幫助醫院搭建緊急應變中心，幫助醫療院所長期監控病人生理數據。

公司的目標是藉由統合基因治療、醫療數據、細胞治療等，建立精準醫療平台。最後提供臨床研究服務，把實驗室的發現，經過臨床一二三期的試驗，讓更多病人可以得到最新的精準醫療治療方式。

創辦人Daniel，台大92級，畢業後去美國杜克大學唸碩士，之後待在矽谷上班跟創業，近期才又回來台灣，目前遊走於上海與台北兩地之間。

【工作職缺】C#軟體工程師(MVC, ASP.NET)

【工作內容】

1. 負責網站開發之分析、設計以及程式撰寫
2. 協助研發軟體新技術與新需求
3. 與客戶端的PM與工程人員溝通，以進行系統的對接與整合

【徵求條件】
1. 熟C#, Visual Studio
2. 熟MVC、LINQ、Entity Framework架構
3. 了解前端開發語言Bootstrap、AngularJS 2.0、HTML、CSS、JavaScript、JQuery、AJAX
4. 有Web API、Stored Procedure經驗更好
5. 具有獨立開發能力，並可以與外部技術及資料庫夥伴以及PM溝通協力
6. 對新創事業有興趣與熱誠
7. 良好團隊合作與溝通能力
8. 積極正面，期許自己能與整個團隊一起成長
9. 個性主動積極，願意接受挑戰，具備創新思維、團隊合作及領導能力等特質
10. 具備國際視野，有基礎英語聽說讀寫的能力

【薪資待遇】面議

【連絡方式】信箱 recruit@wolfdataware.com

【工作地點】上海市嘉定區興榮路788號 （有提供食宿，及台灣上海來回機票）

【工作時間】週一至週五 9：00~18：00

【公司福利】
1. 免費零食
2. 不定期出遊與聚餐
3. 有興趣也有機會到上海或其他業務地點走走

【在Wolf Dataware你能得到】
1. 實務創業經驗
2. 創辦人矽谷創業、產品開發、尋找投資人之經驗分享
3. 未來有機會前往矽谷跟上海做產品發表
4. 一群來自不同領域卻能共同努力的好夥伴

【歡迎加入】
．團隊氣氛歡樂、融洽，我們致力打造一個有family感覺的工作環境，但實際工  作起來也不失嚴謹
．如果你是對醫療新創事業、穿戴式產品、或是社區關懷有興趣的，都非常歡迎。
．我們不需要最強的人，但我們需要有理想、有抱負、對自己有期許的人。
．歡迎將履歷(可附作品集)寄到：recruit@wolfdataware.com，合適者將在7日內安排面試。
．了解更多關於我們，可以到我們的網站 https://www.wolfdataware.com/

job_lists.content:
Requires knowledge and experience in own discipline; still acquiring higher-level knowledge and skills. Builds knowledge of the company, processes and customers. Solves a range of straightforward problems. Analyzes possible solutions using standard procedures. Receives a moderate level of guidance and direction. 

Key Responsibilities :
1. Design or modify electrical/electronic engineering assemblies, layouts/schematics and/or detailed drawings/specifications of moderate scope under general supervision
2. Perform basic engineering analysis under general supervision
3. Perform and generate basic engineering test reports under general supervision
4. Generate related alpha/gamma documentation for product release
5. Coordinate the procurement and assembly of electrical/electronic components/equipment and identify sources of critical parts and subsystems to resolve technical issues
6. Troubleshoot a variety of moderately complex electrical problems
7. Implement concepts for product issues and electrical solutions of moderate difficulty
8. Assist in development of electrical product specifications

Functional Knowledge :
• Demonstrates expanded conceptual knowledge in own discipline and broadens capabilities

Business Expertise :
• Understands key business drivers; uses this understanding to accomplish own work

Leadership :
• No supervisory responsibilities but provides informal guidance to new team members

Problem Solving :
• Solves problems in straightforward situations; analyzes possible solutions using technical experience and judgment and precedents 

Impact :
• Impacts quality of own work and the work of others on the team; works within guidelines and policies

Interpersonal Skills :
• Explains complex information to others in straightforward situations

Education
• Bachelor's Degree
• 2 - 4 Years of Experience
• Software engineering skills: C#, C++, Javascript, , SECS/GEM, Microsoft Windows applications development, Microsoft .Net Remoting.
• Good communication skills.
• Able to travel

job_lists.title: 網頁程式工程師
job_lists.company: 國立成功大學_成電創客學園
job_lists.content:
【工作內容】
1. 規劃、維護、開發前端網頁及後端資料庫系統（MongoDB, MySQL）維護。
2. 網頁專案程式（Python Web Framework）開發及撰寫。
i. 磨課師（MOOCs）線上學習平台
ii. 外掛功能模組
iii. 大數據分析系統
3. 其他臨時交辦事項。

【徵求條件】
1. 學歷：學士或五專以上，電機/電子/資工等相關科系畢業。
2. 精通Python、PHP、HTML5、JavaScript/AJAX、CSS等語法，熟悉其他程式語言者佳。
3. 精通Django, Nginx等網頁伺服器架構，具MongoDB、MySQL、SQL資料庫程式設計能力。
4. 具有與美術設計及前後端程式配合經驗（MVC架構），且熟練跨平台API存取與對RWD（Responsive Web Design）響應式網站技術熟悉。
5. 曾從事二年以上網站建置開發與維護相關實務經驗（請附上相關作品檔案或連結）。
6. 連續工作，任職需滿一年以上。
7. 具有創意、美感與良好邏輯等基礎，能與營運團隊合作者佳。

【工作地點】
國立成功大學創新數位內容研究中心

【工作時間/月休】
工作時間：早上8:30~17:30，中午休息1小時,周休二日 (時間可再議) 。

【公司福利】
享勞健保及年終獎金

【薪資範圍】
依國科會標準：學士級（30,600元），碩士級(35,000元)以上，依經驗調整。

4. 具有與美術設計及前後端程式配合經驗（MVC架構），且熟練跨平台API存取與對RWD（Responsive Web Design）響應式網站技術熟悉。

1.影像辨識演算法開發與應用。 
2.影像處理系統測試與分析。 
3.自動化光學檢測系統控制整合。
4.具影像檢測、製程自動化設備軟體開發經驗者佳。

2.熟C/C++ 及 熟Computer vision 佳。
3.熟 OpenCV、Halcon、MIL 等任一影像軟體者佳。

job_lists.title: 系統分析師、程式設計師
job_lists.company: 國立臺灣師範大學_資訊工程學系
job_lists.content:
依據專案需求進行系統分析、系統研發及系統管理。
專案大多以資訊教育相關資訊系統為主，包括教學系統、輔助教學系統、評測與檢定系統等。除了資訊專案系統開發外，亦有機會參與各項資訊教育推廣活動。歡迎願對我國資訊教育發展做出貢獻之資訊工程師加入計畫行列。

薪資待遇除了月薪外，可享有一年1.5月年終獎金。
經審核符合需求條件者即通知面試，未符合者恕不另行通知。
job_lists.skills: 系統架構規劃、系統整合分析、軟體工程系統開發、軟體程式設計、網路程式設計、資料庫程式設計
job_lists.other_condition: 未填寫

job_lists.title: Android工程師
job_lists.company: 英諾奧茲股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
如果你…
態度積極，熱愛挑戰，學習力強，喜歡探尋最新科技資訊。
討厭Monday Blue，期待找到對工作的熱情與火花。
對於軟硬整合充滿想法與實踐力，
擁有從 0 到 1 的創新實踐精神、渴望將天馬行空或瘋狂點子付諸實踐，那麼你就是我們渴求的夥伴！
如果你….
對創新創業有點想法，但還苦於找不到合作和一起討論的夥伴，那麼我們的辦公室永遠敞開歡迎你前來聊聊！

不限背景，只看態度與能力，全職兼職、專案合作皆可是討論的選項，歡迎即將畢業、剛畢業，或是有相關開發經驗的工程師加入我們，一起成長！

【徵求條件】
1. 有Java基礎   
2. 有Android APP開發經驗 
3. 熟悉Android SDK, Android studio, Git
4. 維護優化程式
5. 配合策劃、UI/UX設計等團隊，完成開發工作
6. 具備探索創新的熱情
7. 態度認真，有自我學習能力，願意與同事分享與交流
8. 有物聯網或雲端開發經驗者尤佳
9. 能提供詳細開發案例尤佳

＊歡迎碩博士在校學生apply，我們彈性的工時可以讓你兼顧學業與工作

2.定期聚餐

job_lists.title: [12561]Lead Software Engineer (CFM)
job_lists.company: 荷蘭商益華國際電腦科技股份有限公司台灣分公司(Cadence)
job_lists.content: # Job Description :--------------------------We need you to become a part of Conformal team! Join one of the most-recognized EDA tools in the world and help deliver what others think is impossible.The Conformal team is a diverse group of innovative, talented and passionate engineers committed to delivering cutting-edge verification technologies and trusted solutions to key high-technology customers around the world. We tackle a breadth of challenging projects all in an enjoyable and  family-friendly environment. We develop must-have IC design tools, next-generation verification technologies, and we influence the direction of verification methodologies. As a part of this team, you will develop, implement, and test advanced algorithms in timing constraint verification, logic verification, synthesis, and related areas.# Job Requirement :-------------------------1) Candidate must have working experience on EDA product development. 2) Development experience in C/C++ is essential. 3) Knowledge of common logic synthesis/verification related algorithms is strongly desired. 4) Knowledge of SDC timing constraint is a big plus. 5) MS/PhD in EE/ECE/CS or related field with at least 3 years of EDA tools development experience.
job_lists.other_condition: 未填寫

job_lists.title: [R20992] Lead Software Engineer (Virtuoso RD)
job_lists.company: 荷蘭商益華國際電腦科技股份有限公司台灣分公司(Cadence)
job_lists.content:
Job Description:
Cadence Virtuoso Layout Suite is used by all of the world's most advanced chip design companies to design their custom and 
analog chips. We are looking for a talented R&D contributor skilled in C++ development on custom layout tools, who is also a good  team player with excellent communication skills in an international and multicultural environment. As part of the team charged with supporting and developing the layout design productivity features, you'll engage directly with some largest IC companies in Taiwan and will be working to fulfill their productivity needs.

Job Requirement:
 -MS/PhD in EE/ECE/CS or related field with at least 3-5 years of EDA software development experience
- Demonstrated proficiency in C++ and general software development skills
- Background in custom layout design and EDA algorithms
- Proficient in speaking and writing English 
- Experiences with Cadence's DFII framework and the SKILL language are a plus
job_lists.other_condition: 未填寫

job_lists.title: [R20467]Lead Software Engineer (Genus)
job_lists.company: 荷蘭商益華國際電腦科技股份有限公司台灣分公司(Cadence)
job_lists.content:
“We are looking for highly motivated individuals to work with the Synthesis R&D team in the Front-End Design business unit. You will be part of a software development team responsible for designing, developing, troubleshooting and supporting highly parallelized logic synthesis optimization software.  “

• PhD (or MS with equivalent working experience) in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or Electrical Engineering.
• Proficient in C++
• Software development experience in EDA (physical) synthesis or placement/routing tools
• Experience with UNIX and/or LINUX software development platforms 
• Willing to debug and solve issues at customer sites with strong analysis and problem solving skills
• Good English communication skill as the development team is distributed internationally
• Knowledge in TSMC fab processes is preferred
• Knowledge of Tcl programming is preferred
• Knowledge of multithreaded and/or distributed computation is preferred＂
job_lists.other_condition: 未填寫

1. 對於App應用程式開發具有強烈挑戰心，追求成就感。

3. 依照規格書之需求，勇於挑戰UI開發。
4. 熟悉XCode開發環境，並開發過Client <-> Server架構，有架設Server之經驗者佳。(?)
5. 熟悉版本控管，有用過GIT者佳。
6. 孰悉Apple Store APP上架流程。
7. 溝通能力佳、能說明想法，提出問題與UI/底層工程師團隊合作。
job_lists.other_condition:
1. 熟悉workflow流程。
2. 具備資料結構、演算法、軟體工程、資料庫管理等專業知識。
3. 有OpenGL或GLKit影像編輯/處理者尤佳。

job_lists.title: Full Stack Web Application Developer
job_lists.company: 美商_睿科網路科技有限公司
job_lists.content:
The Cloud/aGalaxy Team is looking for talented software engineers to join our Taipei R&D Team.

We are building a cloud/device management solution to perform management tasks in deploying A10's network appliances and extended infrastructures.  Some example of the services include, but are not limited to:
 - Device and services management,
 - Provisioning of services like server load-balancers, network resources and topologies, and service VMs, DDOS mitigations, WAF policy templates, etc.
 - Monitoring, trending, and reporting of services under management using a combination of traditional reporting and big data analytics.
 - Streamlined management workflows to ease total cost of ownership of A10 and third-party equipment. 
 - Generate actionable and predictive analytics.

[Job Requirement]
1. Non-trivial experience with Python/Java/Go (at least 2 out of 3) in a professional setting.
2. Have experience or passion in building distributed and scalable software using Docker and Kubernetes.
3. You can discuss technical details in English and Mandarin.
4. Your are picky on superior user experience (UX), browser compatibility, standards compliance, and responsive design.
5. You are more than just competent with jQuery, CSS3, and HTML5.
6. You are comfortable developing under Ubuntu/CentOS
7. You can multitask under fast-paced environment, sometimes without clear software requirement - you can improvise.
8. You can think independently.

Strongly desired:
1. Have working experience with Python, Django, and AngularJS/ReactJS.
2. Have experience with building distributed architecture.
3. Have experiences building application with one or more of the following: ElasticSearch, Logstash, Kibana, Spark, Pig, Hive, HBase, MongoDB, NodeJS, Docker, Kubernetes.


Bonus:
1. Have experience with the following: Bootstrap JS, jQuery, LESS.
2. Keen on following the latest web front end technologies.

job_lists.title: Software Engineer in aFleX development
job_lists.company: 美商_睿科網路科技有限公司
job_lists.content:
aFleX is a Tcl based scripting language used in A10 ACOS. It is used to inspect, modify, and direct data plane network traffic. aFleX works on L2/3 all the way to L7. As a member of aFleX team, you will participate in the design and development of aFleX events and commands, as well as integrate them into current ACOS data plane. You will be developing software for high performance multi core computing environment. You will take ownership for critical software components and work with product management on customer requirements. You will work with architecture and engineering team to develop functional design, utilize your programming skills to produce robust and efficient implementation. You will interact with many other teams including platform, L2/3, L4/7, quality assurance, customer support and tech pubs in the full software product development life cycle.
  
Required Skills and Experience:

Proven track record in Design and Development and able to demonstrate strong proficiency in
● Excellent C programming/debugging skills
● Experience in multi-threading / multi-core environment
● Good networks knowledges from Layer 3 to Layer 7
● Good verbal and written communication skills in English
 
Required Qualifications:
● Minimum BS in CS, CE or EE
● Senior level positions require minimum of 5 years of directly relevant experience
● Can do attitude, self-starter and quick-learner
● Able to multi-task and collaborate with others in a team environment
● English CV/resume

Not Required but Highly Desirable Skills and Experience:
● Good understanding of
   1. TCP/IP stack
   2. Script languages, such as Tcl, Python, Lua ...
   3. L7 protocols, such as HTTP/HTTP2, SIP, SMTP, Diameter ...
   4. Compiler
● Familiar with network tools, such as wireshark, tcpdump, ...
● Experience in complete software development cycle and Unit testing frameworks

job_lists.title: 資深軟體工程師 (Senior Software Engineer)
job_lists.company: 美商_睿科網路科技有限公司
job_lists.content:
Job Description
As a Senior Software Engineer, you will contribute to the advancement of A10 Networks award winning products.  Your responsibilities include designing and enhancing network applications, and providing high quality software implementations.  You will participate in design, code and test plan reviews and interact with cross functional teams.  Part of the job may involve providing assistance to technical support teams on an as needed basis.  Investigation, research and proof of concept projects will also be part of your responsibilities.

Required Qualifications
• Minimum 5 years of experience developing software for network applications
• Strong C/C++ programming skills and hands-on development experience using Linux 
• Experience in multi-threading, multi-core, and real-time high availability embedded systems
• Direct work experience with one of the security technologies: UTM/DCFW, Load Balance, (DPI)Deep Packet Inspection, QoS, WAN optimization, VPN, Firewall, IPS/IDS, or NAT
• Expert at TCP/IP and knowledgeable with common standard protocols such as DNS, HTTP/HTTPS, SSL, ALG, IPsec, AAA(Authentication, Authorization, Accounting), etc.
• Experience programming with one scripting language: shell, perl, python, etc.
• Solid foundation of Layer 2 switching, Layer 3 IP forwarding and routing
• Basic English proficiency in reading, writing, speaking and comprehension
• Bachelor's degrees in computer science, engineering, physics, or math

Preferred Qualifications
• Knowledge of networking security
• Experience programming for high scalability and performance
• Experience with high availability concepts and protocols
• Masters or PhD in computer science, engineering, physics, or math

工作說明
你將擔任資深網路軟體工程師，並加入睿科網路公司的高效能產品開發團隊。
你的責任包括設計、編寫網路應用軟體，以及提高軟體品質。
你會參與跨團隊之 設計，編碼和測試計劃。
如有需要，適時提供睿科技術團隊專業上之援助。
創新技術的調查，研究和實證。

基本須具備以下能力
• 至少五年以上網路相關之軟體開發經驗
• Linux 環境中 C / C++ 程式語言之實作經驗
• 多線程，多核心，即時嵌入式系統, 高容錯系統的經驗
• 至少一種 script 語言的編程經驗，如shell script ，PERL，Python等
• 熟悉網路第2層交換，第3層IP轉發和路由運作
• 深入了解IP網絡和通訊協議， 如TCP/ IP，DNS, HTTP/HTTPS, SSL等
• 具備下列專業技能(至少一項)：UTM/DCFW，系統負載平衡(Load Balance)，深度 IP 封包檢測(DPI)，QoS ，廣域網優化，VPN，防火牆，IPS / IDS，NAT，IPsec或AAA等
• 基本英文能力
• 至少物理，計算機科學，工程或數學的學士學位

具備以下能力尤佳
• 網路安全的知識
• 開發高擴充性和高效能的程式經驗
• 高容錯實作經驗與概念
• 具備物理，計算機科學，工程或數學的碩士或博士學位

About A10 Networks
A10 Networks is a fast growing expansion-stage startup renowned for its technology innovation and leadership in Web Application Delivery appliances. Since the time AX Series was introduced in 2007, we have won three years of The Best of Show at Interop, with many marquee customers worldwide.
Our customers include the top Web Portal providers, top online retailers, top cable operators and many leading enterprises. We have immediate needs to fill 10 job openings in Software Engineering and Quality Assurance (QA) to achieve our hefty goals. All North American positions are based in San Jose, California.
A10 Networks is one of the Top Workplaces in the Bay Area region for two consecutive years, as honored by the San Jose Mercury News. A10 is a promising startup based in Silicon Valley that offers competitive compensation packages and great career opportunities. A10 Networks is an equal opportunity employer M/F/V/D.

關於 美商A10 Networks (美商睿科網路)

A10 Networks (睿科網路) 創立於美國加州矽谷，是一個發展快速、擁有創新技術和引領應用網路科技的公司。 自 2007年推出我們的旗艦 AX系列，連續三年贏得了國際最大Interop展會最佳產品獎，以及許多全球重要客戶的肯定，更受到積極發展雲端科技的臺灣重視與肯定，中華民國經濟部更進一步邀請 A10 Networks至臺灣設立研發中心。
我們以在台北地區建立一個全新的研發中心，並極招募台灣的頂尖人才加入我們的行列。 A10 Networks (睿科網路)不但連續兩年被美國聖荷西水星報譽為矽谷最佳工作場所之一，也是同類產業中成長最快速的公司，在2010年亦獲得全美成長最快之非上市公司 Inc. 500年度排行第46名，這份名單針對目前美國重要經濟來源---美國獨立企業，進行了最詳細及全面性的研究。像Microsoft、American Apparel、Oracle等其他知名企業早期皆藉由進入Inc. 500的排名而受到了關注。同時還榮獲”電腦硬體公司”第二名及”聖荷西當地公司”第二名，A10 Networks創始人兼首席執行長陳澧更成為台灣第一位獲得”最佳亞州經營者公司”第一名的殊榮。

1、協助規劃全集團網站(Web、Mobile)建置，以及分析網站與Server之API架構，串接內外部整體資訊之發展與應用。
2、協助規劃分析集團產品、通路、行銷、管理之內部整合性管理資訊系統之需求功能、流程，製訂規格文件，並共同打造管理資訊系統。
3、協助規劃全集團現行系統功能擴增、優化，與系統流程改善計畫。
4、透過使用者訪談、搜集資料、學習產業/標準Know-How，達成資訊系統解決方案共識，進而與團隊打造資訊服務系統。
job_lists.other_condition:
1、技術平台：ASP.NET、MVC、C#、MS-SQL  
2、2年以上系統分析實務經驗。
3、願意瞭解學習企業商業邏輯，能獨立作業，主動積極並具良好溝通及協調能力者。
4、對內能團隊合作，有熱誠、認真負責。 
5、以下為加分項目：
－ 具旅遊系統開發專案經驗
－ 有系統文件撰寫經驗
－ 有 RESTful API、非關聯式資料庫經驗

job_lists.title: 資深iOS開發工程師
job_lists.company: 雄獅資訊科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
雄獅資訊在台灣 APP 產業已有 5 年以上的經驗與規劃，在業界享譽卓著。
我們除了承接許多知名旅遊相關的軟體系統開發案外，也積極的在開發、
設計自己的平台、產品。

我們需要一位熱情有天分的 iOS 軟體工程師進來我們這個大家庭，一起發
揮創意，讓每個產品的構思與推出可以做到以人為本、以人為尊的完美實踐。

相信您在這裡可以不只是可以學到很多程式相關的技巧，還能夠將你的能力
完整的發揮與應用，有積極向上跟願意挑戰的態度就是我們需要的人才。

工作內容如下：
1. 依照規格書之需求 開發 iOS APP 。
2. 開發、測試、維護 iOS APP 。
3. 使用 Swift 為主要開發語言。
4. 熟悉 SDK 及開發工具 Xcode。 
5. 熟悉串接後台 API。
6. 熟悉版本控制 GIT 。
7. 三年以上開發 iOS App 經驗。
job_lists.other_condition:
如果具備以下條件，面談時有加分效果：
1. 已有自行開發的App 上架。
2. 對於人機互動與 UI 由獨特的見解，已整合到作品內者尤佳。
3. 對於各類型不同開發方式有極高度的興趣與學習能力。
4. 在多媒體與前端相關的其他領域也有開發能力。
5. 對於 Swift 的各類型應用有高度興趣。
6. 對於旅遊產業有高度興趣的人。
7. 具備完整系統專案之分析、設計以及功能撰寫。

job_lists.title: JAVA Card 軟體開發工程師
job_lists.company: 太思科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
POSITION OVERVIEW:
Taisys software engineers develop the next-generation technologies that change millions of users to interact with information and people in a high level of security mobile environment. We're looking for engineers who bring fresh ideas from all areas, including global standard mobile banking/payment covering credit/debit contact/contactless , and SIM/embedded SIM of Telco Applications, etc. 
As a software engineer, you will work on a specific project critical to Taisys needs in our fast-paced business growing and evolving. We need our engineers to be smart, versatile, display leadership of qualities and be enthusiastic to take on new problems across the full-stack as we continue to push technology forward.
In this role, you will be in charge of Java card applet design and development. You will be working on new firmware development, configuration management, certificate, and performance improvement. 
RESPONSIBILITY：
1. Design and implement firmware for smart card systems.
2. Design and implement tools for system bring-up, debugging, and performance/power evaluation.

MUST Qualifications
1. BS/MS degree in EE/CS or relevant technical field 
2. 3 years equivalent practical experience.
3. Strong ability and experience in C , Java programming skills
4.     Able to read specs in English
5.     Eager to study new technology
6.     Self motivation and creative.
job_lists.other_condition:
Plus skills:
1. The experience of Java card applet programming will be a plus.
2. Working experience in mobile device sector
4. Experience in Payment Java Applet – PBOC/MChip Mobile sector.
5. Familiar with Message Security mechanism.

job_lists.title: Java Card 設計驗証工程師
job_lists.company: 太思科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
POSITION OVERVIEW：
As a Test Engineer of Smart Card - Java Card applet team, you’ll work closely with outstanding global engineering teams to help implementation of the smart card testing in a fast-paced dynamic environment.
 
Test Engineers of Smart Card aren't manual testers only - you write scripts to automate testing and create tools so developers can test their own code. 
You navigate DTG code base, identify weak spots and constantly design better and creative ways to identify potential problems. You’ll combine your technical ability, strategic thinking and detail-oriented execution to influence better software design, promote proper engineering practice, bug prevention strategies, test ability, accessibility, privacy, and other advanced quality concepts across products.
You'll have impact on the quality of Taisys growing products and services.
You will own one of the key customer satisfaction metrics - functional performance of the device. You are a key member of the cross-functional team that will launch the product.

RESPONSIBILITY：
• Design and implement DTG functional tests to validate the correctness and performance. Make recommendations to design and test coverage improvement with minimal engineering engagement.
• Develop with Design/Engineering teams functional specs and test plan for the product testing for mass production release.
• Be responsible for implementation, yield and parametric data, correlation, etc. along with playing point into Design Engineering teams for test scripts, specs. requirements.

MUST QUALIFICATIONS：
• BS/MS degree in Engineering or equivalent practical experience.
• At least 3 years of experience in programming or testing products  
• Good logic thinking, have passion to learn and excel.

PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS：
• Proven experience in debug, troubleshooting, and failure analysis investigation.
• Experience with handsets, mobile device testing, bring up, and design validation.
s.

主動發現問題解決問題，不會的會想辦法學會。反應快速，深入傾聽，自信提出見解，總是愛問為什麼不、為什麼要這樣呢?習慣在混亂的需求與困難中，慢慢的歸納前進，找出最佳化的解決方案。

C#

MS SQL

GIT

job_lists.title: 系統研發中心徵聘 Web Developer
job_lists.company: 中國文化大學_推廣教育部
job_lists.content: 我們正在招募有經驗的web系統開發人員，工作執掌範圍包括系統維運、資料處理及軟體專案開發。主要開發環境有二，皆以ASP.NET開發框架為主。其一是以三層式架構建置的.NET 2.0 Web應用程式、二是ASP.Net MVC開發模式。版控系統採微軟Team Foundation Server為主，部分專案會走Git模式。後端資料庫採用Microsoft SQL Server，並持續朝雲端資料庫發展。必備能力:1. 有架設網站經驗，具備資料庫規劃能力佳2. 了解HTML5、CSS3、XML、json等規格3. C#程式語言、T-SQL、javascript 具備基礎能力4. 對程式設計有高度熱誠，喜愛學習，樂意嘗試新技術5. 具備基礎英文能力，能閱讀英語技術文件6. 樂觀進取的人格特質
job_lists.skills: 軟體程式設計、網路程式設計、資料庫系統管理維護、資料庫程式設計
job_lists.other_condition: 符合下列項目可獲額外加分:1. 英語專長2. 精通前端技術，譬如jQuery、bootstrap、angularJS、ReactJS等3. 熟悉三層式或MVC架構4. 具nodejs、Google API、Git 經驗5. 具備行動裝置實務開發經驗

1. Web-based application 程式開發設計。

job_lists.title: 創意設計中心徵聘Android APP程式設計師
job_lists.company: 中國文化大學_推廣教育部
job_lists.content:
這是份具有挑戰性和創新氣氛的工作，我們是一個12人創新專案小組，整合RFID、Beacon等IOT技術，開發自有硬體及軟體APP，從無到有實做各種創新的智慧教室及數位校園應用，團隊專業分工合作，從發想、規劃、設計到開發，沒有階級上下之分。

如果你喜歡動腦、喜歡嘗試，不想一成不變，享受面對未知的變數，然後一個一個解決掉的成就感，這份工作一定很適合你。

我們這群投身在教育產業的科技人及設計人，總認為除了科技公司的選擇外，用科技解決現今教育問題，用創意翻轉教育產業的責任，更為重大且更有意義，現在不做，以後會後悔。
我們急需熱情的人才加入，一同為下一世代創造更有價值的校園應用及教學模式。

能站在公司及使用者角度思考
重視品味、設計及生活
正面思考、尊重他人
【特質】很重要
主動發現問題解決問題，不會的會想辦法學會
反應快速，深入傾聽，自信提出見解
總是愛問為什麼不、為什麼要這樣呢?
習慣在混亂的需求與困難中，慢慢的歸納前進，找出最佳化的解決方案

1年以上Android開發經驗
熟悉物件導向設計原則
有開發適應不同尺寸裝置UI 排版能力
擅長工具 Android Studio

具備View效能提昇、API串接效能提昇等經驗
具備Beacon 整合經驗
行動裝置與Server資料同步經驗
有推播、Facebook、Token串接經驗
Scrum開發經驗
GIT 使用經驗

【工作內容】
創新校園行動服務開發
Beacon應用
物聯網整合應用

job_lists.title: 數位營運中心徵聘 ASP.Net C# 程式設計師
job_lists.company: 中國文化大學_推廣教育部
job_lists.content: 【我們是誰？】我們是一群對系統開發充滿著熱情的年輕人，「 創新丶學習丶服務」是我們工作的核心精神。我們運用資訊科技來創造多元的學習環境，提供更好丶更快丶更完整的科技環境給老師與學生。我們導入敏捷式開發，創造有效率的工作環境，強調團隊的溝通合作，並且鼓勵同仁在工作中增加自我成長的機會。如果你喜歡團隊合作  如果你喜歡嚐試創新  如果你想用科技來改變下一個世代的教育產業  歡迎你的加入。許多事情，現在不做，以後會後悔。★★ 敬請應徵者附上作品 ★★我們需要的人材需要以下條件：★絕對重要的【態度】   正面能量丶尊重他人   願意站在使用者角度來看問題   認真看待每一件事情★很重要的【特質】  在回答「我不會」之前，是否有先做過努力？  在回答「做不到」之前，是否真的思考過各種解決方法？  在團隊合作中是否能接受不一樣的想法與建議？★重要的【專長】   1.基本技能：Html, XML,  Json, Web Services, Web API   2.主要開發語言：asp, asp.net C# Web Form, SQL (MS SQL Server)    3.次要開發語言：Javascript, JQuery, Ajax   ★讓你更棒的【加分技能】   1.ASP.NET MVC    2.Responsive Web Design概念   3.常見的 API使用，如 Facebook API、Google Data API (Maps、Calendar)，OAuth、OpenID、SSO等授權方式運作模式★未來想學的【新技能】   1.iOS App 開發 (Swift)   2.Android App 開發   我們團隊也正在開發新產品丶若你也想學新技能 歡迎你的加入
job_lists.other_condition: 1.ASP.NET MVC 2.Responsive Web Design概念3.常見的 API使用，如 Facebook API、Google Data API (Maps、Calendar)，OAuth、OpenID、SSO等授權方式運作模式4.iOS App 開發 (Swift)5.Android App 開發

job_lists.title: 創意設計中心徵聘 IOT系統整合工程師
job_lists.company: 中國文化大學_推廣教育部
job_lists.content:
這是份具有挑戰性和創新氣氛的工作，我們是一個12人創新專案小組，整合RFID、Beacon等IOT技術，開發自有硬體及軟體APP，從無到有實做各種創新的智慧教室及數位校園應用，團隊專業分工合作，從發想、規劃、設計到開發，沒有階級上下之分。

如果你喜歡動腦、喜歡嘗試，不想一成不變，享受面對未知的變數，然後一個一個解決掉的成就感，這份工作一定很適合你。

我們這群投身在教育產業的科技人及設計人，總認為除了科技公司的選擇外，用科技解決現今教育問題，用創意翻轉教育產業的責任，更為重大且更有意義，現在不做，以後會後悔。
我們急需熱情的人才加入，一同為下一世代創造更有價值的校園應用及教學模式。

近期相關的報導：
http://news.tvbs.com.tw/life/news-656085/
http://www.ettoday.net/news/20150612/520099.htm

http://app.sce.pccu.edu.tw/

近期製作的開發團隊影片
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KT5n9PYQaDU

job_lists.title: 【日本工作】◆東京知名機械.電子.電気.ソフトウェア企業◆誠徵系統工程師《無經驗可》
job_lists.company: 日商樂智股份有限公司台灣分公司
job_lists.content:
★職務内容：
◆お客様向けシステムの詳細設計、開発、テスト、運用を担当して頂きます。
【具体的には】
・WEBシステム/業務システム/スマホ・タブレットアプリ等の基本設計、
　詳細設計、開発、テスト、運用をお任せします。
・要件定義・開発・導入まで一貫して対応しているため、 希望・スキルに
　応じて最適なフェーズ・プロジェクトに参画可能です。
≪プロジェクト例≫ 
■業務系システム開発 
・保険会社コールセンターシステム(200人月) 
・機器ベンダーDynamicsCRM導入支援 
・CRMパッケージ「ONYX」保守サービス 
・大手リース会社・新規財務会計システム構築(1000人月) 　ほか 
■モバイルアプリケーション開発 
・官公庁、金融、通信、製造、エンタメほか、様々なジャンルのアプリを開発。
【この仕事の魅力】
※安定した環境の中で技術の習得ができ、あなたの目標に応じたキャリアを
築いて行くことができます。
★勤務地：以關東、中部、關西為主, 全國有開發專案需求的公司地點為主 
★雇用形態：契約社員（半年後に正社員登用査定あり）
★必要な資格経験：
◆下記のいずれかに該当する方。
・大学や専門学校で何かしらのプログラムを学ばれたた事がある方
・職業訓練校で何かしらのプログラムを学ばれた事がある方
・独学で何かしらのプログラムを学ばれた事がある方"   
★給与：
【月給】19万円～
【年収例】
・年収450万円（30才／経験5年）
・年収550万円（35才／経験8年）
・年収630万円（40才／経験15年）
・年収720万円（45才／経験20年）
【昇給】
・給与改定 年1回（5月）
※月給に35hのみなし残業を含む
※未経験の方の場合研修後20万への昇給規定あり"
★職務時間：9:00～18:00 （配属先により異なります）
★各種保険：健康保険、雇用保険、労災保険、厚生年金
★休日：
・土・日、祝日、
・GW、夏季、年末年始休暇
・産休・育児・介護休暇
・慶弔、有給休暇（10日～20日）など
（事業所カレンダーによる）
・年間休日日数123日"
★諸手当：
・通勤手当（全額支給）
・時間外、深夜、休日出勤、出張手当（全額支給）
・家族、赴任、帰省旅費
・地域手当、役職手当"
★選考過程：書類選考→面接（１～２回）→内定
job_lists.other_condition:
・オープン系システムの開発経験が1年以上ある方
・Java、PHP、.NET系のいずれかの開発経験1年以上ある方
【求める人物像】
・安定的、長期的に就業したい方。
・技術力を追求したい方、マネジメントに挑戦したい方。
・年収を上げたい、手当が豊富な企業で働きたい方。
・新しい技術に挑戦したい方、教育制度が充実した企業で働きたい方。"  
・限定持有日本在留資格的日本在住者。

job_lists.title: iOS軟體設計人才培訓計劃
job_lists.company: 風行天股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
您可能對APP開發有興趣，但還沒有機會真正接觸嗎？

您可能曾經為了了解程式而去補習，但一直苦無機會展現身手嗎？

風行天的軟體設計人才培訓計劃，就是您進入這個產業最好的機會！

我們是台灣APP產業的領導公司，是一個年輕有活力的團隊，在業界享譽卓著。 
歡迎對手機APP軟體開發/設計有高度興趣、無APP開發之相關工作經驗、但非常希望學習專業知識之新鮮人或轉職人士，藉由風行天的人才培訓計畫成為專業的APP軟體工程師！

風行天很驕傲地說，自去年8月推動此培訓計劃以來，至今已超過百人應徵，辦過近10場面試說明會！
我們也成功招募了超過10位APP軟體實習生，也順利的將我們自己的實習生們訓練成為專業的APP軟體工程師。
如今的他們都已經可以獨立作業、獨當一面，開發APP已經不再是夢想！

同時，風行天更自豪地說，在APP軟體業，我們是擁有這樣培訓計畫的先鋒！
我們不怕培訓人才，只怕您不敢挑戰～

※請簡單描述過去iOS的學習經驗、當初是利用何種管道學習；無說明者恕不考慮※

說明會時間：106年5月23日
job_lists.other_condition:

2. 基本條件：需具備iOS基本知識。
3. 主動積極、願意學習、具良好溝通協調能力及問題分析解決能力。
4. 注重團隊精神，能與跨部門的夥伴協力配合。
5. 對APP產業有滿腔的熱血與憧憬。

job_lists.title: PHP助理工程師 / PHP工程師
job_lists.company: 風行天股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
風行天是台灣APP產業的領導公司，是一個年輕有活力的團隊，在業界享譽卓著。
我們需要一位熱情有天分的PHP工程師加入我們。

我們除了承接許多知名業者的軟體開發案外，也積極的在開發、設計自己的平台與產品，所以相信您在這裡可以學到很多程式相關的技巧，有積極向上跟願意挑戰的態度就是我們需要的人才！

工作內容：
1. 協助或獨立處理主管或Senior PHP Developer所交辦的程式維護、調整、除錯或新功能開發 
2. 新專案之需求進行分析、規劃、設計以及程式撰寫（主要以Coding為主，SA視個人能力而定）
3. 參與新專案的開發過程的分析、討論、規劃與架構設計（公司是以Team Work的方式開發整個專案，獨立或兩人以下開發個別功能模組）
4. 能夠參考相關文件、規格或需求開發程式（程式開發前一定會先有規格與流程架構的討論過程，不會直接把需求就丟給你獨立去完成）
5. git版控的簡易維護與上版的執行
6. MySQL資料庫的基本操作與維護
job_lists.other_condition:
1. 良好的Coding Style、程式模組化與功能化的架構設計。
2. 具一年以上PHP web程式開發經驗，熟悉PHP、JQuery、Ajax、HTML、CSS、JavaScript等網頁相關技術。
3. 具Mysql相關管理經驗並熟悉SQL基本語法（CRUD、Join、View、Sub Query...等）。
4. 具任一項MVC framework實務開發經驗，例：yii、codeIgniter、zend、yii、symfony或自行開發的MVC架構...等（以CI為主）。
5. 具任一項版本控管（Version Control）工具使用操作經驗尤佳，例：git、SVN、Rational ClearCase（CC）...等（以git為主）。
6. 具Web Service相關開發經驗及網頁資訊安全處理經驗（知道什麼是XSS、SQL Injection）。 
7. 具獨立與團隊成員合作的經驗，並具備良好的溝通與傾聽技巧（公司為模組或功能獨立開發，整體專案還是Team Work）。
8. 加分條件：API程式撰寫經驗（不需RESTful）、具金流API串接經驗、與不同部門團隊的溝通技巧、不怕直接與客戶或PM溝通。

job_lists.title: Senior Mobile Development Engineer
job_lists.company: 羅技電子股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
The Role:
We are seeking an experienced Sr. Mobile developer to join our enterprise Mobile/Web App development team.
You will be an integral member of a global team that provide solutions to enable Logitech to design the experience, create great products, improve the operational efficiency and achieve the excellence.   This is a group for the people who are passionate, making a mark and having fun. 
You will help to us to build awesome app that integrate with our service platform. You will have an exciting career opportunity to work with broad business organizations, including Engineering, Sales Marketing, Operations, Finance etc, design and deliver high quality solutions that meet the business objectives.


Your Contribution:
Be Yourself. Be Open. Stay Hungry and Humble. Collaborate. Challenge. Decide and just Do. These are the behaviors you'll need for success at Logitech. In this role you will:
• Engage with business, understand the problem. Shape business storyboards into technical solutions and demonstrate excellent problem solving skills
• Lead and participate in application architecture design sessions, and document technical solutions
• Mentor and build intuitive, beautiful, high performance and reliable mobile/web applications 
• Assist in evaluating and defining technology roadmaps in areas of development, testing and deployment of applications in mobile landscape
• Work in partnership with other team members to design cutting edge business solutions on top of Web and Mobile frameworks, contribute technical expertise to all projects as required
• Share insights and best practices and positively influence the rest of the development team
job_lists.other_condition:
Key Qualifications:
For consideration, you must bring the following skills and behaviors to our team: 
• Proven successful track record of delivering high quality enterprise mobile/hybrid applications on IOS and Android
• 3+ years of overall development experience in developing mobile applications
• Strong working knowledge of mobile development frameworks
• Well aware of UX patterns on iOS/Android
• Experience in working on different layers of iOS app
• Experience in Mobile app testing
• Experience in Agile development methodologies


Logitech is the sweet spot for people who are passionate about products, making a mark, and having fun doing it. As a company, we're small and flexible enough for every person to take initiative and make things happen. But we're big enough in our portfolio, and reach, for those actions to have a global impact. That's a pretty sweet spot to be in and we're always striving to keep it that way.

job_lists.title: 軟體工程師－交通基礎設備製造商【日商・日文・日語・福利制度完善・台中工作】(11743)
job_lists.company: 立樂高園股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
★交通基礎設備製造商，軟體工程師招募中！★

工作內容：
主要從事台鐵、高鐵、鐵路運行管理系統，以及鐵路用的繼電器連動系統的維護和後續追蹤之工作。

職缺魅力：
我們平時在從事交通信號裝置、鐵路系統信號設備等相關業務。為了支援人們日常生活而作的系統，這份工作可以讓你感受到幫助別人的喜悅。本公司也能讓你知道，工作並非單打獨鬥，而是大家一起達成一個目標。
此外，運行管理系統如果沒有相當了解的話，進公司約一年後，會到日本進行1~2年的研修課程，可以在總公司裡學習到更詳細、完整的系統內容。
因此，如果對日文部太有信心的人，可以先在台中學習日文，同時也能提升自我的職場競爭力！

公司簡述:
日本總公司1917年在神奈川創立，今年即將迎向創立100周年的交通基礎設備製造大公司。以信號燈為主，從事各種控制系統、電氣機器的設計・製造・販賣等相關事業。到目前，產出許多日本國內"首創"的製品。
1971年來台設立子公司。

職務/組織結構
全體員工:155人
※生產部門約80人。

福利制度：
・周休二日、國定假日
・年終獎金約3個月(視業績調整)
・三節禮金
・一年一次員工旅遊
・一年一次健康檢查
・各種保險完備
job_lists.other_condition:
必須條件：
・軟體工程師學系畢業，或者是有軟體工程師的實務經驗者。
・日文/日常會話程度以上

歡迎:
・在日系的製造商企業中工作的經驗者

★推薦給具備以下條件的你★
・對於狀況說明，能夠簡而易懂使人明白的能力。
・喜歡認真、努力、勤勉工作。
・能夠依照全體狀況，適當的下判斷。

4. 精通如下數據庫的一種或多種：MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Neo4J；熟練使用Redis和Nginx；具有分布式系統或NoSQL開發經驗者優先。 
5. 熟悉並使用過雲端服務，如亞馬遜AWS(EC2, S3, ElasticSearch, CloudFront等)；能夠根據項目實際情況選擇合適的雲服務並搭建和維護後台系統的正常運行。

job_lists.title: 搜索引擎研發工程師
job_lists.company: 竹間智能科技有限公司
job_lists.content:
Keywords: search, recommendation systems, NLP, machine learning 
 
1. 豐富的專業搜索工作經驗，了解搜索引擎原理和網絡爬蟲相關技術，精通搜索引擎相關知識（如分詞-word segmentation，索引-indexing，關聯詞-relevance，權重排序-weighted ranking等), 熟悉搜索評分算法(scoring algorithm)和性能調優；大學以上學歷，計算機相關專業。
2. 精通C/C++/Java/Python語言和數據結構，熟悉Linux平台, Shell編程；精通如下數據庫中的一種或多種：MySQL/PostgreSQL/MangoDB/Neo4j。 
3. ,熟悉 Lucene(Solr)/Sphinx 等開源搜索引擎框架，並有二次開發經驗，有中大型搜索應用的開發經驗；精通solr打分機制、中文分詞、排序等相關技術。 
4. 在以下領域之一有有較強的算法工作經驗：網頁搜索-web search、垂直搜索-vertical search、推薦系統-recommendation systems；具有海量數據處理、高性能計算(high performance computing)、大規模分布式系統(distributed system)開發等方面經驗者優先；有自然語言處理(NLP)，數據挖掘(data mining)方面的開發經驗者優先。 
5. 良好的團隊合作精神，較強的溝通能力，對解決具有挑戰性問題充滿激情。

job_lists.title: 數據挖掘研發工程師 (Data Mining)
job_lists.company: 竹間智能科技有限公司
job_lists.content:

2. 熟悉數據挖掘相關算法(決策樹-decision tree、SVM、聚類-clustering、邏輯回歸-logistic regression、貝葉斯-Baysian)，有扎實的基本功和良好的邏輯思維能力；對數據敏感，有強烈的好奇心，喜歡折騰數據並從數據中發現價值。 
3. 精通數據分析模式，如統計學習理論，貝葉斯統計，算法信息理論，歸納推理等；並且了解它們的強弱之處；有深度CNN (Deep Convolutional Neural Network)和深度RNN (Deep Recursive Neural Network) 經驗優先。 
4. 熟悉Java或者Python語言，熟悉SQL和ETL相關流程，熟悉Linux環境及常用命令。

job_lists.title: [RD] React Native App開發工程師
job_lists.company: 天堂遊戲有限公司
job_lists.content:
Hey there, thanks for your interest in Paradise-Soft.

PS's Mobile Engineering team is searching for a React Native developer that can make our mobile apps best in class. We leverage React Native to build beautiful, performant and intuitive Android and iOS apps. You’ll help us ensure that the mobile apps are better than a native equivalent by pushing the bounds of JavaScript and to look for high-value opportunities to introduce React Native to our PS apps. If you like working on a fast-paced team developing customer-facing features that are used at an incredible scale, then our team might be a perfect fit. Come hit the ground running as we architect the next generation of our platform.
 
Responsibilities:
● You'll own the experience end-to-end, all the way down to the native code that runs within the Paradise-Soft Gaming App.
● Be a major individual contributor of coding on the team who is comfortable working independently.
● Design and develop software features based on visual mockups or user stories.
● Monitor the mobile ecosystem for native platform changes and innovative apps that can be leveraged internally for performance or user experience improvements.
● Ensure reliability by always taking into consideration performance and different network connection scenarios.
● Prototype user experience concepts prior to new feature implementation.
 
Desired Skills & Experience:
● Computer science fundamentals in object-oriented design.
● Computer science fundamentals in data structures.
● Good knowledge of JavaScript/React Native/Redux(Flux) development preferably with demonstrable projects.
● Contributed to several apps in the App or Play Store.
● Up to date with the latest iOS and Android best practices.
job_lists.other_condition:
The ideal candidate would have experience doing mobile application development in either Objective C, Swift, or React. If the candidate has no experience in this area, the ideal candidate would be interested in mobile, and able to ramp up in this area.
Candidates will have excellent problem-solving skills, a solid understanding of computer science fundamentals, and a quantitative mindset. We are seeking engineers who are highly pragmatic and can solve real-world problems quickly and efficiently. We want engineers who thrive in and contribute to a team atmosphere.

job_lists.title: [RD] DevOps Engineer
job_lists.company: 天堂遊戲有限公司
job_lists.content:
Paradise-Soft is the fastest-growing online gaming company in history.  If you are a motivated, intelligent, creative, and hardworking individual, then this job is for you!

This position is part of DevOps team, responsible for availability of critical our applications. You will work with a team of engineers designing, implementing and maintaining monitoring tools to ensure critical platform elements and applications are monitored

As a member of the DevOps team, you should be comfortable working in a dynamic and challenging environment and be prepared to take on problems as they crop up. Most importantly, you'll be expected to learn quickly, make some mistakes, develop solutions, and make big contributions

Responsibilities:
1. Automate deployment, monitoring, management and incident response
2. Monitor site stability and performance and troubleshoot site issues
3. Scale infrastructure to meet rapidly increasing demand
4. Collaborate with developers to bring new features and services into production
5. Develop and improve operational practices and procedures
6. Provide on-call, emergency or implementation support outside of normal scheduled hours as needed
7. Design, provision, and manage cloud infrastructure in AWS for applications and data infrastructure
8. Propose best practices for continuous integration and deployment, performance and health monitoring, and alerting.

Must
1. Familiar with Docker, Docker Compose, Docker registry, Git, CI/CD
2. Familiar with one of container orchestration platforms ( Docker Swarm, Google kubernetes, DC/OS) at least.
3. 3+ years experience Amazon AWS including EC2, VPC configuration, RDS instances, S3, Route 53, and Elasticsearch 
4. Advanced knowledge of at least one scripting language (Bash, Python, etc), configuration management tool (Chef, Puppet, etc) and command execution framework
5. Excellent communication skills and team work

Plus
1. Experience working in infrastructure as code, such as CloudFormation, Chef, Terraform, Packer, Ansible ... etc.
2. Familiar with Golang ( We are using Golang here)
3. An understanding and passion for developing highly secure and highly available systems

job_lists.title: C#軟體工程師
job_lists.company: 威旭資訊有限公司
job_lists.content:
如果你不是瘋狂熱愛寫程式
如果你不是執著追求高效能
如果你不是熱衷鑽研新技術
為節省彼此寶貴的時間，請您跳過 。


身為優秀的軟體開發工程師 
你熱愛寫程式但在工作上實際寫程式的時間卻寥寥可數？
你對於新技術很有研究熱忱但公司卻只想得過且過，沿用舊有架構？
你明明有更好的解法， 卻在時間壓力下逼著提出連自己都覺得汗顏的方案？

如果擁有強大軟體開發能力的你正深受其害，甚至被公司歸類為不討喜的族群，威旭資訊是個讓你做出改變的機會！

「不只好，還要更好」是威旭傲驕的偏執， 因此我們從不滿足於現有的技術水平，更因如此，威旭打造一個軟體開發者的夢幻環境，讓有熱情、有天賦的開發工程師能夠在威旭作最擅長也最喜歡作的事！我們敢自豪的說，威旭的開發工程師 90% 以上的時間都只需專注於程式開發與新技術鑽研，沒有流於形式的會議、沒有繁瑣的報告、更沒有與程式開發無關的業務支援！

職務內容
1. 金融資訊軟體開發。
2. 金融數據蒐集及處理分析。
3. NO SQL及關連式資料庫應用。

具備技能
1. 需熟悉C#，具備GUI開發經驗者佳。
2. 需具備資料庫使用經驗，以MongoDB或MySQL應用為佳。
job_lists.other_condition:
符合以下條件者優先：
1. 具備以下任一語言開發經驗：R、Python。
2. 對演算法與資料結構有一定認識。
3. 對金融領域之網路資料蒐集、數據分析應用有濃厚興趣者。
4. 良好溝通能力、邏輯清晰及樂於接受挑戰和新事物。

job_lists.title: System Reliability Specialist
job_lists.company: 禦騰科技有限公司
job_lists.content:
JOB PURPOSE
System Reliability Engineers are hybrid systems and software engineers who are responsible and take ownership for reliability, automation, and other issues related to keeping the service uptime in Nexusguard foundation. SREs are integrated within the DevOPs team who will be a part of developing infrastructure software, maintaining it, and scaling it.

KEY ACCOUNTABILITY AREA
● Contribute to design, write and deliver software to improve the reliability, scalability, latency, and efficiency of your services.   
● Solve problems relating to mission critical services and create solutions to prevent problem recurrence; with the goal of automating response to all non-exceptional service conditions.   
● Influence and contribute to new designs, architectures, standards and methods for large-scale distributed systems.   
● Engage in service capacity planning and demand forecasting, software performance analysis and system tuning. 
● Participates in the final roll out of new releases. This includes performance and site acceptance testing that will assure adherence to functional specifications.
● Monitoring high level product problem concerns and seeking commitment from appropriate departments so that necessary actions can be taken
● Serving as an expert in the application of product problem and/or reliability analysis techniques.
● Perform root cause analysis for production issues where the root cause is in infrastructure, environment, configuration, or deployment routines; understand when to escalate to product development teams; remediate root causes and implement preventative actions.
● Participate in after-hours maintenance when necessary, respond to emergencies, participate in customer calls when called upon in support of initiatives and incident response
● Creating complex and/or new reports and metrics
● Participate in 24*7 rotation duties
job_lists.other_condition:
Education and Professional Certificate Level:
● BS Degree in Computer Science, Electrical & Computer Engineering or Mathematics or equivalent experience 

Length and Type of Job-Relevant Experience:  
● 5+ years of experience and outstanding coding skills in C, C++, C#, Java, Python or similar languages   
● 1+ years of experience in testing, deploying and supporting services   
● Experience in SDLC and Agile projects   
● A passion for building and participating in highly effective teams and development processes   
● Expertise in problem solving and analyzing distributed systems and critical production service environments   
● Debugging, testing / validation and analytics/SQL skills.   
● Big data experience preferred (COSMOS, Hadoop)   
● Fundamental understanding of OSI model/stack   
● Strong communication and collaboration skills to work with people from a variety of technical backgrounds

job_lists.content:

- 行動網路定位演算法開發。

必要條件 :
- 至少一年 C++開發經驗。

具備下列其中至少一項 :
- 熟悉無線通信技術(GSM/UMTS/LTE)。

- develop/enhance network positioning algorithm

- At least one year experience in C++

Better have at least one of the following:
- Knowledge of cellular networks(GSM/UMTS/LTE).
- Experience of triangulating (multi-lateration) the position of a handset based on cellular network or other methods.
- Experience of network optimization.
- Experience of algorithm design.

Plus term:
- Familiar with Java or Python

job_lists.title: JR0019722 NAND / SSD Product Test R&D Engineer (Location: Hsinchu)
job_lists.company: Intel_美商英特爾亞太科技有限公司台灣分公司
job_lists.content: NSG (Non-Volatile Memory Solution Group) is one of the fastest growth businesses at Intel.  This position will provide you the opportunity to be part of Intel's fast growing team, work on industry's latest 3D NAND memory technology & Intel Optane Storage Technology, for NSG's high performance, revolutionary 3D NAND/ Optane SATA & PCIe SSD (Solid State Drive) products.   You will be responsible for Product Test Development and be the focal person to provide Manufacture Engineering Support to our ODM at Hsinchu area.    You need to understand the whole NAND/SSD testflow, test contents, own part of the Test Code developments,  ensure robust test coverage & cost-effective manufacture process optimization, HW/SW/FW maintenance & issue debug, initial failure analysis, yield monitoring & analysis, etc. for both NAND/Optane media and corresponding SSD products.  You need to collaborate with cross-functional team of Product Development Engineering, Systems Firmware Engineering, Manufacture Operation, Quality, Reliability and ODM stakeholders, to achieve above goals.
job_lists.other_condition:
Minimum Requirement:
- Bachelor/Master degree in Electrical Engineering or Computer Science, etc.
- Fluent in both English and Mandarin. 
- C/C++ coding experience.
- Excellent teamwork and leadership skills, ability to cooperate well with global stakeholders. 

Preferred Qualifications:   
- 2+ years industry experience in memory or SSD/HDD storage business.
- Familiar with ODM Manufacture process & environment.
- Familiar with PC system, Windows/Linux applications.
- Industry experience in SATA/SAS/PCIe SSDs.
- Exposure to entire Memory & System Test flow (Fab, Probe, Assembly, Test, Q&R) 
- Strong inter-personal communication skills

job_lists.content:
本公司為港商Shopline台北分公司，主要產品為電商自助平台，整合網站設計、商品管理和金物流系統，為電商賣家提供簡單上手的架站工具，在台灣、香港及東南亞線今擁有五萬名以上商戶並持續快速增加中。(http://www.shopline.tw)

Shopline在2013年創立，讓商家輕鬆快速開設個人化的網路商店，也讓消費者更便利的在手機上購物。Shopline團隊2014年被挑選參加500 Startup加速器計劃，受矽谷及亞洲投資者關注。歡迎對startup環境有熱誠的人才加入我們的頂尖團隊！

【工作內容】
-負責網站程式開發及維護 
-撰寫高品質的軟體程式 
-新技術學習及導入 
-使用工具：Ruby on Rails, Redis, MongoDB, Beanstalkd, AWS
job_lists.other_condition:
【你必須具備的技能】
- 擅長Ruby on Rails, Redis, MongoDB, Beanstalkd, and AWS.
- 有物件導向程式設計(object-oriented programming)經驗 
- 有資料庫(database)相關經驗 
- 主動負責、細心的工作態度 
- 良好溝通能力及團隊合作能力
- 對軟體開發及網路科技發展有興趣 
- 具有電子商務程式開發經驗者優先 
- 需基本中英文讀寫能力

【其他條件】
-對新創產業文化有高度熱誠
-熟悉或對敏捷式開發(Agile development)有興趣
-具有電子商務程式開發經驗者優先
-具有英文讀寫能力聯絡人：

job_lists.title: 網頁前端工程師 Front-End Engineer
job_lists.company: Shopline Limited_商線科技有限公司
job_lists.content:
本公司為外商Shopline台北分公司，主要產品為電商自助平台，整合網站設計、商品管理和金物流系統，為電商賣家提供簡單上手的架站工具，在台灣、香港及東南亞擁有五萬名以上客戶。(http://www.shopline.tw)

Shopline在2013年創立，讓商家輕鬆快速開設個人化的網路商店，也讓消費者更便利的在手機上購物。Shopline團隊2014年被挑選參加500 Startup加速器計劃，受矽谷及亞洲投資者關注。歡迎對startup環境有熱誠的人才加入我們的頂尖團隊！

工作內容：
1. HTML、Javascript、CSS 設計網頁，提供更好的前端使用者體驗。 
2. RWD (Responsive-Web-Design) 網站開發及各式版型模組化。 
3. 網頁切版並與後端工程師協同開發網站。 
4. 研究新型態的前端互動技術。 
5. 整合Web API，協助進行平台界接及整合, 與後端工程師協同合作串接 RESTful API
job_lists.other_condition:
1.一年以上前端架構及模組分析設計經驗，並熟悉 HTML5、Bootstrap 或其它 CSS Framework
2. 具framework (ex. AngularJS, Vue.js, React.js) 開發經驗，且能與後端工程師溝通者佳
3. 喜歡接觸新事物，抗壓性高，擅溝通協調，重視團隊合作。
4. 面談時請攜帶作品集，線上作品(網頁)尤佳。

Plus:
* 諳RWD與UX觀念，以利提升產品使用體驗。
* 具整合後台Rails經驗，熟悉server side技術
* 需熟悉Git 版本控制指令流程經驗

job_lists.title: 數據工程師 Data engineer
job_lists.company: Shopline Limited_商線科技有限公司
job_lists.content:
Shopline, a fully funded, 500 Startups Accelerator company, is looking for a passionate and talented Software Engineer​ to join our team in Taiwan. You’ll be a part of an engineering team that is dedicated to developing a reliable and robust commerce platform for merchants in Asia.

At SHOPLINE we are working on very intenteresting initiatives that would involve using data-mining and machine learning. with the vast amount of data that we currently have and growing exponentially. We will share details during the interview.  

【What you’ll be doing】
1. Develop, operate, and monitor ETL for data collection, cleansing, processing, storage, and analytics
2. Develop data visualization to track data usage, server status, and represent data insights
3. Automate data process tasks and support data analysis tasks
4. Use existing algorithms and implement data-mining strategies to achieve our end goal.

【What Are we looking for?】
1. At least 2 years of experience in building and operating large scale distributed systems or applications
2. At least 2 years of experience in processing data with Python (scikit-learn), Scala, or R
3. Familiar with Hadoop ecosystem, such as Spark, Hive, Hue, Pig
4. Experience with implementing highly scalable systems on top of cloud infrastructures, such as AWS or GCP
5. Expertise in Linux/Unix environments and familiar with shell scripting
6. Expertise in hands-on ETL job design, components and modules development of data process
7. Great communication skill and can-do attitude
8. Desired skills: Python (scikit-learn), Scala, Hadoop, Hive, Spark, Linux/Unix, AWS, MySQL/Mongo/PostgreSQL, R
job_lists.other_condition: Data mining and machine learning algorithm experience is a big plus

job_lists.title: 大數據工程師
job_lists.company: 動力安全資訊股份有限公司
job_lists.content: 透過Big Data相關的技術，結合雲端服務，分析網路、作業系統、資訊安全事件、應用系統、電子商務，從資料中發掘價值，協助企業營運及發展。這份工作的內容，包括整體系統的規劃及建置、資料分析、各種世界級解決方案的整合應用、程式的開發撰寫，雲端服務的整合應用；會接觸到的產業，主要包括金融業、高科技業及政府單位。因此，除了技術本身的發展以外，您可以透過這份工作，累積各種Domain Knowledge。無論您是否具有相關經驗(大數據、程式撰寫、系統、網路、資安等等)，只要有志朝Big Data專業領域發展，我們誠摯地邀請您一起共創未來！

job_lists.title: Software Engineer: Java, Python, LabVIEW
job_lists.company: 動力安全資訊股份有限公司
job_lists.content: About the JobAt Dynasafe, we're leading customers on their journey to Automations (Intelligent Building, Smart Data Center, Industry 4.0, and IoT) and Software-Defined Network(SDN) by enabling them to increase their productivity and security. If you're passionate about programming, learning new technologies, and working in an ambitious and highly visible project environment, please don’t hesitate to apply for this position. The potential candidate would be a member of the R&D team working on solutions based on SDN platform and various Automation standards.在動力安全，我們帶領企業客戶走向以軟體整合應用SDN網路為基礎的自動化與智慧化 (智慧建築，智慧機房，工業4.0，與物聯網)。協助客戶提高安全，效率，於增強在國際上的競爭能力。若你對自動化系統及SDN網路有興趣, 及對寫軟體程式學習新技術充滿熱忱，歡迎你加入動力的行列。Role and responsibilities:  ．Design and develop a highly customizable Automation and/or SDN-based solutions. (設計開發自動化及以SDN為基礎的應用軟體系統)．Write functional and design specs as well as responding to requirement documents and system level test plans. (編寫軟體規格文件，測試計劃等)．Collaborate well with other engineers and other engineering groups for team work(需與其它部門協同合作)
job_lists.other_condition: 科系:資訊工程,資訊科學,機械工程,自動化(控制)工程系,電機工程-資訊或其他相關科系擅長工具:LabVIEW 軟體研發平台(Preferred),Linux,IOS,AndroidQualifications / Requirements:  BS in Computer Science, EE, or equivalent degree. Masters is preferred 　　　Minimum 2 years software programming experience. Automation and/or SDN project experience is preferred. Essential Knowledge/Skills:  Java, and Python programming skills in a Unix/Linux environment  Experience with Linux kernel system and scripting (such as Linux Shell, Python) is preferred   Experience with LabVIEW Automation programming is preferred Desirable Knowledge/Skills:  Familiarity with Linux Operating Systems (e.g. Ubuntu)  Familiarity with automation standards(KNX,Industry 4.0)Familiarity with OpenFlow Controllers for SDN (e.g. Ryu by NTT) 

job_lists.title: Infrastructure Developer, Cloud Platform Development
job_lists.company: 沛星互動科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content: We are looking for experienced Infrastructure developer to join us at our global HQ in Xinyi District., Taipei City.As an infrastructure developer, you will be responsible to build system to manage all resources of our infrastructure (e.g., computation, blob/object storage, DNS and other resources on cloud and physical servers). You will work closely with all of our engineering teams, too. We aim to provide high reliability of system operations and infrastructure system/automation solutions/implementations. You will have opportunities to co-work with engineers with talent, and manage and operate more than hundreds of cloud servers and resources across various vendors on a daily basis. You must have the ability to learn software and cloud technology in an English speaking workplace and document them.[Roles and Responsibilities]1. Build system to automate service operations across clouds - resources across various cloud vendors (e.g., AWS, GCE) - coordinate/manage scheduler and deployment of distributed system (e.g., Kubernetes, Mesos) - dashboard to track overall system status and resource usage - auto-scaling for public/private clouds2. Assist improving service deployment process across teams to ensure end-user experience3. Automate common infrastructure operation tasks as web application 4. Survey, test and integrate API of cloud solutions5. Write document for system design and implementation
job_lists.other_condition: 1. At least 2 years of work experience as a software engineer.2. Bachelor degree or above in computer engineering/computer science or related fields.3. Familiar with Linux.4. Familiar with one of those programming languages - Python - Golang - Shell Script5. Able to communicate his/her design with other engineers6. Fluent in English. - Required experience and skills: - Linux system programming - Distributed system setup and building - Experiences of any IaaS/PaaS services/platforms7. Preferred Skills: - Application deployment and configuration management design and implementation (e.g., Puppet, Ansible, Saltstack) - Implement software deploy pipeline with CI/CD manners - Experience with Orchestration framework such as Mesos, Kubernetes - Experience with operating large scale distributed system - IaaS/PaaS cost estimation and architecture design

job_lists.title: Technical Consultant
job_lists.company: 沛星互動科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
Our Technical Consultant is the bridge between our products and their applications with our clients and data and business objectives. In other words, you are the link between product team, customer and sales. Your goal is to generate technical solutions and successfully implement them at the customer with existing products and concepts or bringing the new requirements to product team on behalf of the customer. 

This requires in-depth knowledge of our products: you are familiar with all of the details from development, service operation to the sales strategy. You must also have excellent communication skills to help you work with the customer.  

You responsibilities:
- Developing solutions for customers by working out existing product solutions for data integration, service application recommendations and bringing new requirements to product team on behalf of the customer. 
- Discussing the product definition, implementation, operation and clarifying issues with the customer. 
- Establishing and maintaining customer relations.

job_lists.title: AI Backend Engineer
job_lists.company: 沛星互動科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
Appier's mission is to make AI easier for everyone to use. To achieve this, we build AI systems to connect heterogeneous data in the cross-screen era, to process information efficiently while achieving our goals, and to solve new and exciting real-world problems. Are you passionate about AI, and looking to be part of this flourishing AI age? Do you want to witness how different types of data play a key role in concurrent AI systems and contribute to improving the capability of these systems? Do you want to build incredible AI systems and watch them grow to meet our product needs? If yes, we'd love to talk to you. You will enjoy the excitement of working with our many talented scientists and engineers to deliver next-generation AI solutions while growing together with our fast-paced startup.
 
Job Responsibility: 
- Build a flexible framework to speed up the development process of AI models
- Turn exciting AI prototypes/ideas into products
- Develop next-generation AI backend systems related to large-scale real-time data access, collection, analytics and monitoring
- Continuously improve the quality of AI production systems
job_lists.skills: 軟體工程系統開發、軟體程式設計、網路程式設計、系統架構規劃與維護
job_lists.other_condition:
[Minimum] 
- Strong problem-solving skill and passion for learning new technologies
- Great communication skills to scientists, engineers, product managers and other teams
- Write clean and maintainable code
- Sufficient backend development experience using Python in Unix/Linux environments

[Preferred]
- Familiarity of the machine learning flow of building a data-driven AI system, e.g. the steps for constructing a digit recognition system from MNIST database
- Experience in query authoring and optimization of SQL/NoSQL databases
- Experience with distributed computing and machine learning frameworks (Spark, Hadoop or Flink)
- Experience with general purpose programming language (Scala or C++ is preferred)
- Experience with one or more continuous delivery tools including but not limited to: Jenkins, Ansible, Docker.

job_lists.title: Backend Developer
job_lists.company: 沛星互動科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
Back-End Software Engineer – 
Safari with extremely smart and self-driven people
Have front-end experience but want to accumulate more back-end experience? 
Great at back-end platforms but want to dabble with Artificial Intelligence?
Dreaming of growing with the smartest and self-driven people on this island?
Awesome! YOU are the one we are looking for to join this Safari solving the most difficult problems with AI technology.

We are…
At Appier, we solve the most difficult user problems and use AI technology to bring value to the world. How? Using AI technology, simply providing organized data for data scientists to analyze can no longer satisfies us. We break the barrier between human-machine and automate cognitive process of human mind, the best decision making which takes hundreds of thousands of human brain to achieve.

Going back to people, Appiers come with the best academic background and equip with best practices from the past experiences in tech giants such as Google, Yahoo...etc. 
Of course, what is impressive isn't where we are from, but what we've accomplished. We've launched the behavior analysis platform which can comprehensively understand anyone, at any time, on any devices. Just imagine we are the closest friend of everyone in the cyber world and can help you even before you think of. Can you imagine how powerful it is in different applications?

The Challenge...
We are creating more services generating tremendous value to the world using AI technology and with the incredible speed of the growth of our customers, we need experienced and the smartest people like you to design the most flexible, scalable back-end architecture with optimized performance to pave the engineering road of our new products.

We Love...
A true adventurer, a go-getter of an engineer who is self-motivated and driven and willing to involve in every aspect of the productization cycle from idea brainstorming to engineering art work.

Responsibility...
1. Design & develop server-side architecture & function logic of new services
2. Design and maintain database schemas for new services
3. Ensures the scalability of the system
4. Ensure the high performance of responsiveness to requests from the front-end
5. Integrate the front-end modules built by your coworkers into new services
6. Build reusable code and libraries for future use
7. Build unit tests and test automation
8. Handle and resolve issues escalated from the production operational environment
9. Perform code reviews
10. Participate in idea brainstorming and contribute ideas to technology, algorithms and products
job_lists.skills: 系統維護操作、軟體工程系統開發、資料通訊與網路應用、軟體程式設計、結構化程式設計、網路程式設計、系統架構規劃與維護

[Must requirement]
1. Self-driven mindset(Responsible, Aggressive, Proactive)
2. A basic understanding of front-end technologies
3. Experience in code complete, knowing how to write quality codes 
4. 3+ year experience in back-end programming using Python, Javascript
5. 3+ Experience in integration of multiple data sources, data migration, transformation
    and database schema(Go/Mongo DB, NoSQL/Rest API)
6. Proficient in using code version control tools, such as Git
7. 2+ year experience in back-end architecture design with proven stories

[Plus]
1. MS in computer science
2. Experience in driving technical projects from beginning to end
3. Experience in real-time log aggregation
4. Experience in distributed programming
5. Experience developing large applications, and applying code design patterns to implement modular, maintainable and extensible design solutions
6. Knowledge of best engineering practices around building high performance, reliable and scalable web services

RPG 是什麼 ?
RPG (Report Program Generator) 程式語言主要用於開發 IBM AS/400 主機上的應用系統，因 AS/400 主機價格較高所以多用於中大型企業如金融保險業等要求安全與穩定性高的企業，泛太資訊深耕 AS/400 領域快30年，是業界少數有能力培訓RPG程式設計師的公司之一。

job_lists.company: 映雲科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
<在這裡你可以獲得的> 

1. 首年即享年假 12 天，我們相信 Life Work Balance 你會做得更好 
2. 自動冒出零食的點心櫃，開心爆笑的工作氣氛，總是會發生各種好玩的事

我們非常歡迎你加入我們的行列!!!

Nice to have:
1. Experience in MFC is a plus
2. Experience in Direct3D is a plus
3. Experience in video decoding CODEC is a plus

job_lists.title: 前端工程師
job_lists.company: 新華科技有限公司
job_lists.content:
1. 負責網站前端開發工作，優化前端功能設計。
2. 與視覺設計師協同合作，做版面規劃、套版、特效、互動設計等。
3. 與後端工程師協同合作，做資料傳遞與呈現。(後端工程師使用 PHP)
4. 協助規劃系統雛型、操作介面、流程等。

【工作技能需求】
- 瞭解 JavaScript / ES6 特性及語法。
- 懂得善用 JavaScript 框架或函式庫。(如 Angular.js/Node.js/React.js/Vue.JS 等)
- 熟悉 RWD 響應式設計，並有前端優化經驗。
- 熟悉 HTML5、CSS3、jQuery、Javascript。
- 熟悉 Git 操作。
- 良好的邏輯及溝通能力。
job_lists.other_condition:
【加分條件】
- 有 APP 開發經驗。
- 有 Web 遊戲開發經驗。
- 熟悉前端開發流程，懂得程式檢查、精簡化、模組化。
- 熟悉前端安全設計、自動部署、測試及除錯。
- 熟悉 cocos2d 引擎者優先。

【額外福利】 
- 彈性上下班
- 周五下午茶
- 點心櫃
- 研磨咖啡
- 每季核發績效獎金
- 每半年加薪考核

job_lists.title: Senior Java Developer
job_lists.company: Dialog Semiconductor_德商戴樂格半導體有限公司台灣分公司
job_lists.content:
While joining our IT team based in Taiwan, you are the developer of our global manufacturing data reporting system and will be working closely together with the product engineering user group on web based applications and analysis tools

Requirements:
• Develop framework based applications in our web based reporting system
• Develop reports in our web based reporting system 
• Develop new and maintain existing data transfer scripts
• Develop new and maintain existing PL/SQL functions inside our Oracle database cluster
• Support our internal customers using the provided systems in case of problems

In order to be considered, you will need:
• Advanced skills in Java and Python programming language
• Advanced skills with Oracle databases (SQL)
• Minimum 5 years of professional experience
• Advanced knowledge of html / XML / web pages development
• Be able to work in a team environment
• Bachelor or Master degree with relevant background (Computer, IT, Science)
• Fluent English language

job_lists.title: Data Analysis Engineer
job_lists.company: Dialog Semiconductor_德商戴樂格半導體有限公司台灣分公司
job_lists.content:
The purpose of this job role:
- Data analysis engineer to support the product engineering department with the statistical analysis tool and be an administrator of this tool
- Support internal customers in data analysis based on data in our Oracle database cluster

Requirements:
- Be responsible and administer the existing data analysis tool (Tibco Spotfire) for template based or statistical ad-hoc analysis
- Improve automation of data analysis for global manufacturing / operations department
- Provide support in the areas of
o Statistical analysis
o Aggregation of data
o Visualization of data
- Develop new and maintain existing PL/SQL functions inside our oracle database cluster
- Support our internal customers using the provided systems in case of problems
- Flexible to undertake international travel

In order to be considered, you will need:
- good skills in data analysis / statistical analysis
- Experiences in administrating a global tool, including patching, etc…
- Minimum 4 years of professional experience
- Skills with Oracle databases (SQL writing, PL/SQL writing)
- Some knowledge in Python script language
- Some knowledge in R language (for statistical analysis) nice to have
- Be a teamplayer
- Data Analysis Engineer
- Bachelor or Master degree with relevant background (Computer, IT, Science,…)
- Strong written and verbal English is essential

你想參與世界級的軟體開發嗎? 你希望你開發的軟體是銷售至全世界的市場嗎? 
CBX Software來台灣設立研發中心, 目前大力徵才中, 我們針對新進人員會有完善的培訓, 培養你成為獨當一面的優秀工程師, 如果你是重視軟體開發且樂於分享知識的人,  這裡會很適合你, 我們重視軟體工程,  開發流程上會有design review 及 code review, 而內部利用JIRA confluence做知識分享.

實習期間, 我們會教你以下觀念, 讓你學習到如何成為一位優秀軟體工程師
• 物件導向觀念
• 軟體開發流程
• 正確的軟體開發觀念
• Design pattern
• 如何撰寫易讀及易維護的程式碼

【我們希望你】
• 對撰寫程式有高度熱情
• 樂於學習
• 熱愛團隊合作
• 想把事情一次做好的正確心態

【職位責任】 
• 設計及開發全新的軟體功能、特點和程式庫 
• 優化及加強現有軟體的功能和性能表現 
• 編寫軟體設計的規範文檔 
• 程式編碼及全面的單元測試 
• 與管理團隊緊密合作，以確保軟體開發與需求相符

Find us on http://www.cbxsoftware.com
Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/CBXsoftware/
Linkedin : https://www.linkedin.com/company/cbxsoftware
Twitter : https://twitter.com/cbxsoftware
job_lists.other_condition: 科系：計算機信息系統或相關學歷

job_lists.content:
Summary: 
Generally manages a group of SW Development Engineers from both a personnel and product perspective while supporting the architectural and process initiatives from the company. Relies on experience and judgment to plan and accomplish goals. The ideal candidate will be a hands on developer first and then hire a team of developers.



Essential Duties and Responsibilities:  Primary duties include but are not limited to:
• Establishes a collaborative, engineering-driven team environment which is consistent with our company’s culture.
• Responsible for ensuring Software development standards and the Software development Process are followed. Develop strategies to improve software development processes and product quality.

job_lists.title: OTP2_285 [Fast Growing B2B Startup] 軟體開發經理
job_lists.company: 藝珂人事顧問股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
我們是一間正在成長的軟體公司，致力研發拓展事業版圖的各種科技產品，幫助各個企業節省成本、降低流動率，以及培育人才，進而精準管理以達到最佳效率。我們擁有極佳團隊默契，產品皆為公司優秀的研發團隊歷經多時所創之結晶。我們團隊經驗豐富，成長快速，曾任職於 Amazon，IBM，MicroStrategy，PayPal等大型科技公司，公司資源豐足，也希望網羅各地好手與我們共同深耕蓬勃。

我們正在找一名軟體開發經理，負責在我們的產品平台上建立領先業界的的企業員工關係管理應用與服務。我們發展迅速並有愉快的工作環境。您的工作重點將是為製造和飯店業的客戶創造出驚豔的軟體解決方案，並對他們的生活產生正向影響。

job_lists.title: 前端工程師 (Front-end Engineer)
job_lists.company: 盈科泛利股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
【工作內容】
負責依照產品功能需求開發前端網頁程式，並且根據視覺設計需求完成CSS切版，搭配完成交互體驗、質感、性能等兼備俱佳的網頁。
 
【職位要求】
1. 2+年軟體設計開發工作經驗，能夠分析、設計、實做產品，且有網站專案上線經驗
2. 熟悉Babel, Webpack等 Modern JavaScript的開發工具
3. 熟悉ES2015+語法
4. 熟悉CSS3, RWD
5. 熟悉GA, GTM, Facebook pixel等電子商務追蹤工具
6. 熟悉網站SEO觀念
7. 了解使用React, Redux的SPA開發手法
8. 了解Angular1
9. 具有串接第三方 API 經驗
10. 具有GitHub或Bitbucket使用經驗
11. 具有前端程式碼測試與品質控制經驗
12. 對Open Source接受度高

【加分項目】
1. 具有設計背景的相關經驗，對 UI/UX 設計敏感度佳
2. 有SCRUM, Agile開發經驗
3. 線上有相關專案作品

【文化特色】
1. 自主自律的團隊文化，第一年即可按比例享帶薪年假（七天），採彈性上下班制；
2. 讓工作更有意義，第一線同仁會隨時更新來自市場和用戶的反饋，辛苦看的到成果；
3. 快速迭代開發，隨時調整步伐，不求半年上線一個龐雜的大系統，只求每個SPRINT都能推出有感的小功能；
4. 保證年薪13個月，若公司達成營運目標另有其他獎金。

【公司介紹】
盈科泛利股份有限公司 (Accuvally Inc.) 的主營業務為「Accupass活動通」，是亞太地區最具影響力的活動SaaS平台。除了為各式活動主辦單位與個人提供辦活動及售票的服務，也有完善的行銷推廣功能可供主辦單位使用，深受各界客戶信賴。

「Accupass活動通」與中國的姊妹站「活动行」 攜手締造佳績，成為在亞太地區每月活動數與主辦單位數最多的活動SaaS平台，於2014年獲得軟銀賽富、DCM、高通資本A輪投資，在今年2017年完成數億元的A+輪融資，公司估值突破15億元，本輪融資包括日本最大人資網站Recruit、中國大陸騰訊及共享辦公業者UrWork三方共同參與。

我們接下來將整合多方資源，快速擴展到亞洲各國，這是一段艱辛及困難的旅程，我們需要更多的夥伴，在這條路上和我們一起奮鬥。
現在就加入Accupass活動通，和我們一起為人們創造更多故事與回憶！讓每個人的生活都能因活動而生動！

Job Responsibilities

• 2nd tier technical support of system and application issue

• In-depth monitor system and application status
• Routine review of logs on all operating system, application and server

• Document system design, operation procedure, server specification, etc
• Work on normal office hour but require to standby during non-office hour

工作內容
• 伺服器、應用程式、SAN等等的安裝、配置、維護及優化
• 二階系統及應用程式技術支持
• 實現對系統及應用程式的更改請求
• 深入監控系統及應用程式狀態

• 與其他IT團隊合作，設計IT項目的解決方案

• 正常辦公時間內工作，但需要在非辦公時間隨時候命

Job Requirements
• Degree in Information Technology or related discipline
• 3 years + of system and application support experience
• Hands-on experiences of Windows and Linux Server, VMWare, WebLogic, Adobe FMS and MS Exchange
• Knowledge of video streaming technology will be advantage
• Good team player and willing to learn
• Proficiency in Chinese and fair in English

條件要求
• 大學學歷以上，電腦相關專業
• 三年以上系統及應用程式支持經驗
• 熟練掌握MS Windows及Linux伺服器、VMWare、WebLogic、Adobe FMS及MS Exchange

job_lists.title: 軟體工程師 - Blockchain
job_lists.company: 香港商翱鶚股份有限公司台灣分公司
job_lists.content:
區塊鏈，也叫分佈式共享總賬，是近幾年最具顛覆意義的互聯網技術。區塊鏈構建 P2P 自組織網路，時間有序、不可篡改的帳本，分佈式共識算法，從而實現去中心化信任。區塊鏈技術可以應用於銀行、證券、審計、數位貨幣、互聯網金融、政府公開信息、電子證據、數據安全等領域。
◎ 負責基於區塊鏈(Blockchain)的互聯網金融產品的設計和研發
◎ 研究區塊鏈的，運行機制和底層實現等
◎ 開發、實現和改進加密協議，設計安全協定和架構
◎ 開發基於區塊鏈的服務產品，包括後端協定、基礎架構、系統服務及其相關客戶端
※ 月薪：５萬元起，底薪14個月 ※
job_lists.other_condition:
【能力要求】
◎ 良好的邏輯思維能力，能夠解決問題
◎ 具備良好的團隊協作精神
◎ 對於計算機系統、資料結構、和演算法有一定的掌握程度
◎ 有 Python 或是 C++ 的開發經驗
◎ 熟悉 Linux 系統及常用指令
◎ 具備 RESTful API 設計和開發所需的相關知識
◎ 對分散式系統的設計與開發有基本的認識
◎ 熱愛開源，關注區塊鏈技術

【加分項目】
◎ 有實際參與開源專案的經驗，區塊鏈尤佳
◎ 熟悉 Bitcoin, BigchainDB, Ethereum, IPFS, 或其他區塊鏈相關技術
◎ 對比特幣/ 數位貨幣/區塊鏈行業有一定瞭解
◎ 擁有分散式系統、密碼學、或 P2P 技術相關開發經驗
◎ 對不同的分散式共識演算法有所了解（如：Raft, Mining, PoS, Paxos, etc）

job_lists.content:
Company introduction: AI System, apply in CRM system, the market is in China
Offices: TW 50 RDs, Shanghai/Beijing/USA 110 RDs
If you're interested in this field, please feel free to contact me for further discussion via dorothy@recruitexpress.com

1. 豐富的自然語言處理(NLP)實際項目工作經驗，包括文本分類 (text classification)、信息抽取 (information extraction)、知識庫構建 (knowledge graph construction)、主題詞標引 (keyword tagging)、自動摘要 (automatic summarization)等；熟悉機器學習(machine learning)的各類算法，並有實際項目使用經驗。 
2. 能夠利用自然語言處理的理論和方法研發分詞 (word segmentation)、詞性標注 (POS tagging)、命名實體識別 (named entity recognition)等基礎算法；善於跟蹤自然語言處理業界最新動態，進行自然語言處理相關的其他算法預研。有搭建知識圖譜 (knowledge graph)和基於雲端的機器學習系統 (cloud-based machine learning)者優先。 
3. 精通C, C++, Java, 或Python中的一門或多門語言，精通數據結構和算法設計，熟悉Linux / Unix系統和Shell編程; 有MapReduce或Hadoop等海量處理經驗優先。 
4. 優秀的分析問題和解決問題的能力，對解決具有挑戰性問題充滿激情；對數據敏感，有強烈的好奇心，喜歡折騰數據並從數據中發現價值。 
5. 較強的溝通能力和邏輯表達能力，具備良好的團隊合作精神和主動意識，良好的自我驅動和學習能力。

job_lists.title: DO-[曼谷]PHP 工程師/架構師, 70-100K*14個月(福利超優住酒店式套房還有健身房跟游泳池!!!)

job_lists.content:
泰國公司：專注於網路視頻、遊戲、社交平臺的服務與解決方案
員工人數：100人

招聘職務：PHP 工程師 (*1) / PHP架構師 (*1)
薪資預算：月薪7-10萬
工作地點：泰國曼谷
福利：餐補+宿舍+機票補貼+福利補貼+帶薪假+工作簽證
工作內容：
1、進行互聯網產品平台開發、維護，對系統性能瓶頸進行優化；
2、對專案開發目標進行技術選型和決策，給出具體技術方案；
3、與團隊成員共同協作，分享技術方案，指導初級程式開發員；
 
職位要求：
1、3-5年大流量網站/遊戲/視頻網站開發或web應用開發經驗，熟悉LINUX + PHP + MYSQL開發；
2、能獨立設計穩定高效的大型電子商務平臺/系統架構，具有良好的資料結構知識及應用經驗；
3、精通基於PHP和MySQL的WEB應用開發，熟練掌握LAMP ，熟悉資料庫原理，能獨立分析需求並設計高併發分散式資料庫,掌握MySQL資料庫設計及優化；
4、具有比較強的分析問題和解決問題的能力、熱愛技術，對技術的追求永無止境，思維細膩，交流順暢，有代碼潔癖，注重優雅，積極主動，樂於分享並具有快速的學習能力和適應能力；
5、良好的團隊協作精神和執行力。

福利:
1、您可以得到——工作簽證：入職後，公司給您辦理當地可長期停留、回國往返暢通無阻正規合法的工作簽證；
2、您可以得到——當地福利：工作簽證辦理完畢後，會為您繳納個人所得稅，根據實際情況享受當地福利保險等；
3、您可以得到——假期：除享受當地法定節假日，還可享有11個工作日的帶薪年假；
4、您可以得到——報銷補貼：年度機票補貼4000人民幣，年底發放。
5、您可以得到——餐補：每月1.7k-3k的飯貼補助，與月工資一起發放；
6、您可以得到——高檔住宿：星級酒店式套房，免費游泳池、健身館、高檔住宅社區距離公司5—20分鐘走路路程；
7、您可以得到——稅後純收入：公司承當一切稅款，發放給您稅後的到手純收入；
8、您可以得到——年底雙薪：每年度發放13個月薪的薪資；
9、您可以得到——團隊旅遊：每一年團隊組織出島三天兩夜旅遊，若不旅遊則可折現給予員工；
10、您可以得到——吃遍美食：每個月團隊有固定的聚餐福利，免費吃遍大街小巷美食。
